33b3(mdo sde): ba yang nyam su myong bar byed do// de ltar de lha'i bde ba thams cad myong ba yin no// de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes des/ sum bcu rtsa gsum
33b4(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas mthong ba na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa
33b5(mdo sde): mthong ngo // sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ de nas thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rtags nas/ 'di ltar gang gzhan gyis gsod pa po dag
33b6(mdo sde): nyi ma gcig tsam srog gcod pa'i tshul khrims bsrung du bcug la/ 'khor ba las thar par 'dod pa rnams ma yin par len pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang /
33b7(mdo sde): 'bras bu chu ngur 'gyur ba yang spang du bcug na de lus la bral nas bde 'gro sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams mthong ba'i gnas su skyes par 'gyuraro// gnas mthong ba de
33b8(mdo sde): yang ri rab kyi steng mtho ba yin la/ khyed cag gi las sna tshogs snang ba bzhin/ gser dang dngul gyi bkra bas phye ba yin no// lha rnams mthong ba'i gnas der 'dzes nas/
34a1(mdo sde): ri rab kyi drung thams cad la lta bar byed de// gser dang dngul las byas pa'i shing bai dur+ya bkra bas rnam par phye ba rnam du ma la lta bar byed do// lha'i
34a2(mdo sde): phreng ba dang / gos gyon pa rnams gser gyis brgyan pa'i sa bzhi rnams la dga' bar byed/ yongasu spod par byed pa lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing
34a3(mdo sde): sdug pa dang lhan cig bai dUr+yar tshal dang / nye ba'i rwa la rnams su dga' bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed do// der de bzhin rtag tu bza' ba dang / gtang ba chu bo ltar
34a4(mdo sde): 'bab ste/ 'di lta ste nu bo ro zhim zhes bya ba dang / nu bo shugs chen 'bab ces bya ba dang / chu bo dga' bcas shes bya ba dang / chu bo dga' bcas tshes zhes bya ba
34a5(mdo sde): dang / chu bo brtsegs 'bab ces bya ba dang / chu bo zhags 'phreng zhes bya ba dang / chu bo stong 'bab ces bya ba dang / nu bo gang dgar 'bab ces bya ba ste/ nu bo de dag ni
34a6(mdo sde): myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad rab tu dga' ba yin no// ro sna tshogs dang / mdog sna tshogs yod pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/
34a7(mdo sde): 'o ma'i mdog dang / pad+ma ra ga'i mdog dang / a da rnyil gyi mdog dang 'thun pa'i dang / bai dur+ya'i mdog dang / gser gyi mdog ltar ser ba dang / kha cig
34a8(mdo sde): mdog 'dres pa dang / chu shin tu dri zhim zhing brtan pa rtag tu khyad par 'phags pa yang 'bab bo// gzhan yang bza' ro dang dri dang / mdog sna tshogs su 'byung
34b1(mdo sde): ste/ 'di lta ste/ ro sha kha ra dang / 'dra ba dang lha'i dri dang mdog dang / mdog skye bo dang / ro ji ltar 'dod pa de dag ste/ lha rnams ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du bzang
34b2(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi ro de dag kyang de ltar 'gyur ro// tshal dang nags tsha la sna tshogs dang / me tog dri zhim po rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas shing / bya kha dog sna tshogs
34b3(mdo sde): dang / rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// de dag sa'i phyogs nyams dga' ba der/ lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongasu skor nas sil snyan dang /
34b4(mdo sde): glu dbyangs dang / bro gar sna tshogs kyis rtsod par byed/ dga' bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed do// der tshal 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste shing sa la'i
34b5(mdo sde): tshal dang / shing sa la'i tshal chen po dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i shing ljon pa'i tshal dang / me tog rtag tu yod pa'i tshal dang / rlung ji ltar 'dod pa'i bde bar 'bab pa'i
34b6(mdo sde): tshal ste/ chal dga' ba de rnams na gser gyi lcug ma 'phyung bas ni mdzes/ dril bu g.yer ki'i dra bas bkris bya 'bum snyed sgra 'byin pa dga' ba'i lha'i dbang po/
34b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i bde ba dag gis lha'i rnams nye bar 'tsho bar byed de/ phan tshun grog su gyur cing / phan tshun longs pa gcig tu don du byed pa nad dang / mya ngan
34b8(mdo sde): dang bral ba bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral ba/ lus ngal ba dang bral ba/ tshol ba nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ ci dgar dpyod pa la brtson/ ci dgar rgyu ba ci dgar gnas/
35a1(mdo sde): nag tshal gyi nang dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / pad+ma'i tshal dang / mthong na yid 'phrog rnams dga' bar byed do// mthong ba na gnas pa/ 'dod pa'i yin/
35a2(mdo sde): tan lngas tshim pa'i rnams 'od ni/ rang gi 'od la lus ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin phra ba dang / sdom pa dang / yang bar sbyar la/ ci dag 'gro ba gar dga' 'gro ba/ gang mthong
35a3(mdo sde): bar 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur zhing / thob nas kyang sus kyang mi 'phrogs la/ thob nas de'i nang du 'gyuraro// mthong ba'i gnas na gnas par gyur pa'i lha rnams bde
35a4(mdo sde): ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang yod de/ rang gis legs par byas pa'i las rgyu dang 'bras bu kun nas bslangs pas/ ji srid du 'dod cing sdug la yid du 'ong ba legs par
35a5(mdo sde): bsrungs pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len par spangs pa bral bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ lha me'i tshogs rnams dang / dga' bar byed dga' mgur
35a6(mdo sde): spyod par byed do// der las zad nas lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas las kyi 'gro ba ji lta bu dang / las la rton pa dang 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin skye bar 'gyur
35a7(mdo sde): te/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ las de
35a8(mdo sde): dang rgyu 'thun par ri la gnas pa de dag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing nor dang shin du ldan pa dang / rab tu bde ba dang / mchog tu gzugs bzang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi bar bzang
35b1(mdo sde): por dro ba dang / bsil ba'i nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
35b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed do/ de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/ lha rnams kyi gnas ri rtsen gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'jug pa mthong ngo // der sems can
35b3(mdo sde): dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas gtags nas/ gang gis lus kyi tshul khrims rnams gnyis bsrungs pa
35b4(mdo sde): yin te/ srog chags bsad bar chas pa dang / bcings pa thar par byas shing mthu che bar 'gyur la nus pa dang ldan pa zhig lam du zhugs te/ bkres shing skem bzhin du
35b5(mdo sde): bu ram shing gi ldum ra 'am/ rdzing bu grong dag tu pa'i bcud dmaM/ bu ram shing gi bcud ma byin par ma blangs/ sems can gsad par bya ba dang / ma byin par blang
35b6(mdo sde): nas 'jigs te 'gro ba thar par bya ba'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyis 'jig rten sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas ri rtser gnas pa'i lha rnams/
35b7(mdo sde): kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang de bde ba'i longs spyod du ma dang ldan zhing / de yul che ba lta bu du mas bdas pa yin la/ de yang 'dod chags kyi chu bo
35b8(mdo sde): lta bu yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi chu bo dang / rgyags pa'i gling dang / mgu ba'i gling du chags pa dang / kun dga'i chu mig dang / rtag tu rtogs pa'i rlabs dang /
36a1(mdo sde): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya sdug pa'i bya dang / lta ba chu sran 'dzin khri kun tu 'khrugs pa dang / rab tu thogs pa du ma ya
36a2(mdo sde): yor 'gro ba dang / tshal dang nye tshal chu yis bar bur ded pa dang / pra dog gi nya dang spro ba chu las rgal ba dang / yul du ma'i ri khrid nas chu 'bab ste/ sred pa'i chu bo 'dam rdzab
36a3(mdo sde): las sogs pa rnams pa de lta bu dag las lha rnams 'byung bar mi nus so// gzhan yang chu bo gang+gA'i pha rol gyi 'gram gi rlabs mi mngon par ltar thog ma med pa'i dus nas
36a4(mdo sde): rgyun shin du zab mor rab tu zhugs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams na skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa
36a5(mdo sde): dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rlabs lta bus khyab cing myur du 'gro ba'i sred pa'i chu klung lta bu de sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu yang yin la/ mi rnams
36a6(mdo sde): kyis kyang chog par mi nus te/ de ltar sred pa'i rnam pa chu bo lta bus ri rtse nas gnas pa'i lha rnams rab tu 'das so// de ltar lha de dag lha me'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor
36a7(mdo sde): te/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed/ rtse bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// der tshal 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar
36a8(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste tshal rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba dang / tshal rtag tu mngon dga' zhes bya ba dang / tshal sprin ltar dkar rtsegs zhes bya ba dang / tshal kun nas mngon
36b1(mdo sde): dga' zhes bya ba dang / tshal zla ba 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang / tshal gang ga'i steng du rgyu zhes bya ba ste/ tshal de dag ni ri rtse na gnas pa'i lha rnams yin no// tshal de rnams kyi nang
36b2(mdo sde): na lha dag bde ba du ma dang ldan zhing / bud med kyi dga' ba rnams dang lhan cig rtsa bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ gtung ba'i chu bo rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ chu bo sna tshog
36b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / chu bo lag 'thil gyis byugs cing reg pa zhes bya ba dang / chu bo ngoms mi myong zhes bya ba dang / chu bo me tog ku mu da dang / u da pa la skyes zhes bya ba ste/
36b4(mdo sde): chu bo de dag gi 'gram gnyis ka ril khebs pa yin no// rdul dang shel dang gser gyi shing ljon pa 'bras bu dang ldan zhing / me tog dang ldan pa rnams kyis lha'i sa gzhi
36b5(mdo sde): de dag nyams dga' bar brgyan pa'i sa gzhi der dge ba'i las sna tshogs dang / las byas pa sna tshogs kun nas slang ba rnams kyi tshal de dag dang / chu bo de dag dang / sa
36b6(mdo sde): gzhi de dag dang / zas dang / skom de dag dang chu bo ltar 'bab pa de ltar bu lha de rnams lha'i rol mo dang / lha'i gnas chen po dang / thag su gtags pa ma yin pa'i
36b7(mdo sde): lha'i gos rnams kyis dga' bar byed do// lha de dag rang las 'byung ba sha dang rus dang / rnag khrag dang / bral ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid ngal ba dang bral ga/ lus
36b8(mdo sde): dang yid rtag tu kun nas dga' ba rnams ji srid du lus dang ngag gi 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong gshin du bsil ba rnam par smin pa mchog tu bde ba/ mtho risu skyes pa
37a1(mdo sde): nges par myong bar 'gyur ba/ dge ba'i las ma zad par de srid du 'gros 'chos shig dga' bar byed/ rtse bar byed yongasu spyod par byed do// de dag zad
37a2(mdo sde): de lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur la shi nas kyang las ji ltar byas pa bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal
37a3(mdo sde): te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba/ mir grub pa'i las kyis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/ las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu longs spyod can du 'gyur zhing /
37a4(mdo sde): rtag tu shes pa la dga' la/ yid la dgod pa dang / rtsed mo dang / rtse ba dang yul bzang por skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras
37a5(mdo sde): bu rnam par smin pa des sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas rtog par byed de sum bcu rtsa gsum na lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan gang zhig yod snyam na/
37a6(mdo sde): des thos pa las 'byung ba'i shes pas btags nas/ blta na sdug na gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gnas ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur
37a7(mdo sde): snyam nas/ der btags nas gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ sems can gzhan chus khyer ba 'am/ mtshon gyis bsad par bya ba srog phyung zhing / nor rdzas sam
37a8(mdo sde): bdag nyid la mi lta bar chu nas phyar ba dang / bkres bzhin du lam 'gro bar na gzhan ma byin par blang ba la rab tu spro bar skyed kyang len par mi byed/ gzhan yang phyogs dben
37b1(mdo sde): par byin na 'tshe ba nyam nga bar gyur kyang 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dag kyang ma byin par len par mi byed/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma gus pas bslab pa'i gzhi rdul phra me chen ral ba la yang
37b2(mdo sde): 'jigs par lta na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro'i grong khyer chen po blta na sdug du skye bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer de yang dpag tshad khri yod la khyams khris legs
37b3(mdo sde): par rnam par bye ba yin no// grong khyer de'i sa gzhi 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas la/ kun nas khang pa chen po bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang gzhan yang rdul las byas pa
37b4(mdo sde): dang gzhan yang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa dang / gzhan yang mthong ka sna tshogs las byas pa dang / gzhan yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri dag gis
37b5(mdo sde): bkra bar byed pa yin no// de dag gi srang yang kun nas shin tu rnam par phye ba yin la/ gzhi mdo dang / ba gam dang sgo dang pu shu'i rtse mo dang / khang bzangs kyis sa ris
37b6(mdo sde): shin du rnam par byed pa yin no// khang pa de dag kyang nyi ma gang med na sgron ma lta bur gyur te/ ji ltar nyi ma med na sgron mas gsal bar byed pa de ltar nyi ma med kyang khang
37b7(mdo sde): pa'i mchog de rnams las de ltar 'od 'byung ngo // grong khyer de dag kun nas tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal de rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/ tshal dang nye ba'i tshal kha
37b8(mdo sde): cig tu bai dur+ya las byas pa dag la mu tig gi dra bas bris/ kha cig gser gyi shing ljon pa dag la dngul gyi dra bas bris/ kha cig dngul gyi shing ljon pa dag la gser gi dril
38a1(mdo sde): bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'byin pa/ kha cig rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa'i bskyed mos tshal bkra ba yin la/ kha cig dpag bsam kyi shing yin te/ lha dang /
38a2(mdo sde): ngag gi yid la bsams pa de dag las thob par 'gyur ro// tshal kha cig an da rnyil dang bai dur+ya las byas pa yin te/ de nas gser gyi bya rnams sgra snyan pa sna tshogs 'byin
38a3(mdo sde): la/ gser gyi tshal gang yin pa de na/ dngul gyi bya rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse/ 'thong ka'i tshal gang yin pa de na/ bya pad+ma ra ga'i mdog tu 'dug pa rnams skad snyan pa
38a4(mdo sde): 'byin cing rtse gser gyi tshal gang yin pa de na bya lus sna tshogs 'dres pa rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse ste/ de ltar grong khyer chen po legs pa'i mthong na nye ba'i tshal du gyur pa
38a5(mdo sde): rnams mdzes pa yin no// srang dang gser gyi khang pa mdzes par byas pa gang yin pa de dag la dngul gyi ka ba dang / bai dur+ya'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin/
38a6(mdo sde): gser gyi srang gang yin pa de dag la bai dur+ya'i ka ba brtsugs shing gser gi shing ljon pa dang / khang pas brgyan/ sran dang khyim 'dres pas mdzes par byas pa gang yin pa de ni
38a7(mdo sde): bya gser gyi mdog can yod de grong khyer blta na sdug gang dang gang du snang ba de dang de dpe' med par mthong ngo // grong khyer de yang kun nas tshal chen po bzhi rnams kyis mdzes par
38a8(mdo sde): byas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste dra ba'i 'phreng ba dang / shing chen po dang / 'od gsal ba dang / mthon ka dga' bas so// tshal thams cad dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod de tshal
38b1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad chu bo chen po khri yod pa/ gser gyi pad+mas khebs pa yin no// chu bo de dag shin du nyams dga' ba yin zhing / 'gram gnyi ga zhig pa med la/ gser dang /
38b2(mdo sde): dngul dang / shel dang / an da rnyil dang / shing ljon pa che po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// tshal chen po dag bung ba 'dab ma bai dUr+ya la lus rdul 'dug pa'i tshogs
38b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/ gang bung ba rnams kyi sgra snyan pa'i drung du mi'i gling bu'i sgras bcu drug char yang mi phod do// bai dUr+ya'i shing ljon pa rnams la
38b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu gser gyi mdog can shin du dri zhim zhing kha ra snyi babs ches lhag pa'i ro dag yod la/ 'bras bu rnams kyi dri gang yin pa dpag tshad du 'byung ngo // bya rnams ngo
38b5(mdo sde): bo nyid kyis rgyags pa yin la/ de nas yang dri gang yin pa des brgya rgyur du shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro// gser gyi shing ljon pa gang yin pa de rnams la dngul gyi 'bras
38b6(mdo sde): bu lha'i dri dang mdog dang ro lnga dang ldan pa dag 'byung shing bai dUr+ya'i sdong po dang / gser gyi 'dab ma yod pa gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras bu kha dog sna tshogs yod
38b7(mdo sde): pa dag 'byung ste/ de ltar tshal kha dog rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs dpa'i med pa gzhan dang mi 'dra bas grong khyer chen po blta na sdug yongasu bskor nas rnam par gnas so//
38b8(mdo sde): kun tu rtog pa'i ri mo bris pa ltar/ lha'i las rnam pa du ma byas shing / las rnam pa du ma sna tshogs byas pa rnams kyis de rnams kyang sna tshogasu 'byung ba yin te/
39a1(mdo sde): / de ltar 'bras bu rgyu dang thun par rgyu'i 'bras bu yin no// ji ltar sa khyon gyi rnam pa ji srid pa de srid du 'bras bu'i rnam pa yang 'byung bar/
39a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de ltar grong khyer lha na sdug pa gnas pa'i lha rnams bde ba mang po du ma dag gis phrogs pa yin no// grong khyer de ngo bo nyid kyis legs mthong nyid yin te tshal khang
39a3(mdo sde): bzangs gser dang / byi ru dang / spug dag gis brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu gser ka'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis bkris pa gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka sgra snyan pas mdzes
39a4(mdo sde): par byas pa'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang / bskyed mos tshal de dag tu blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha rnams 'khod do// lha'i grong khyer gyi gnas rol mo dang / sal snyan
39a5(mdo sde): rtag tu sgra 'byin pa rab tu 'byin cing / lha dang lha me'i tshogs rnams kyis kun tu gang ba de na/ btung ba dang / 'phreng ba dag gis mdzes par byas la rgyal mtshan dang /
39a6(mdo sde): ba dan bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dag gis rab tu bskyed do// yang ri rab kyi steng gi grong khyer du lha'i tshogs bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma dag gis kun tu gang zhing las chen po rnams kyi
39a7(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa de na 'di ltar lha mthu rab tu che ba par 'os pa chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ bskyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod pa rtag tu yid mi dga' ba/ lha dang lha me'i tshogs
39a8(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du mas kun tu gang ba sa ya phrag gsum 'khod pa rnams brgya byin gyis ma lus par yongasu shes so// gong gis tshe lha'i grong khyer chen po bskyed mos tshal gyi
39b1(mdo sde): dga' spyod de nas bskyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du 'gro ba de'i tshe/ lha rnams kyi shing rta 'bum phrag du ma rnams dang 'gro ste/ lha de rnams 'gro ba dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
39b2(mdo sde): ru mtshon sdug gu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i shing rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / kha dog sdug gu snum pa sna tshogs pa dang / dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogasu 'dug pa
39b3(mdo sde): bye ba phrag stong 'khrigs pa dag 'byung ngo // 'di lta ste/ an da rnyil las byas pa'i gzhal med khang yin pa de la shing rta'i mda' pad+ma ra ga las byas shing / de la shing rta
39b4(mdo sde): steng gi khang pa rin po che las byas/ lam ni spug las byas/ phyi rol ni bai dur+ya las byas/ sa ris ni gser las byas la/ kun nas dril bu g.yer ka 'khrigs pa'i
39b5(mdo sde): skra 'byin pa de nas yang lha rnams gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan gyis 'gro bar byed de la/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i mda' ni gser las byas/ shing rta'i steng gi
39b6(mdo sde): khang pa ni bai dUr+ya las byas sa ris ni spug las byas/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs/ phyi rol ni rin po che margad lta bu la byas/ ngos ni byi ru las/ srog shing ni dngul las
39b7(mdo sde): byas pa yin no// kha ci'i shing rta'i mchog rnams pa gzhan gyis 'gros par byed de/ 'di lta ste kun nas shing rta'i mnga' gser las byas ngos ni mu tig gis g.yogs/ sa ris
39b8(mdo sde): ni pad+ma ra gas shin du rnam par phye srog shing dngul las byas/ kun nas byi rus ni mdzes par byas pa yin te/ shing rta 'bum phrag mang po gsal ba mtshan nyid dpe' med
40a1(mdo sde): pa de dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te/ 'bum phrag rnam pa du ma de rnams lha dag nyid zhon nas tshal chen po de rnams ga la ba der 'dod
40a2(mdo sde): bar byed de/ rgyal mtshan la la bai dUr+ya las byas/ rgyal mtshan la la gser las byas/ yu ba la la dngul las byas/ rgyal mtshan la li'i yu ba pad+ma ra ga las
40a3(mdo sde): byas pa/ rgyal mtshan dang ru mtshon la la'i mdog du ma yod pa dag gis na mkha' bar med par byas nas/ bskyed mos tshal du gnas par byas nas/ bskyed mos
40a4(mdo sde): tshal du gnas par bya ba'i phyir yid rab tu dga' bas/ tshal chen po bzhi po ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// de ltar lha de rnams 'dong bas na sil snyan bye ba 'bum phrag
40a5(mdo sde): du mas sgra 'byin cing / rol ma'i snyan pa sna tshogs phan tshun rdob par zhugs pa dag yod de/ shin tu bzang zhing nyams dga' ba'i khyad par che ba yin no// ji ltar
40a6(mdo sde): las byas ngan pa dang / 'bring dang chen po byas pa bzhin las bde ba rnams kyis rjes su 'jug pa na/ 'dong bar byed de/ lha de rnams so so la lha me'i tshogs brgya 'am/
40a7(mdo sde): stong ngam 'bum rnams gar byed/ glu len rab tu dgod cing yan lag lnga dang rol mo snyan pa dang / bcas pa rdob pa zhes bya ba kun du gang zhing byed la/ tshal chen po ga la ba
40a8(mdo sde): der 'dong bar byed do// lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa'i lha mo de dag thams cad lha de rnams dang so sor phrad pa la/ de ltar bro gar byed bkod
40b1(mdo sde): par byed/ rtsed mor byed do// 'di ltar lha de rnams 'dod pa la rnam par zhen pa zhes bya bas dga' bar byed de/ lha'i sgra snyan pa chang tshing gi nang na lha'i sgra snyan pa de dang gar dga'
40b2(mdo sde): mgur 'gro ba'i lha rnams lha'i 'dod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar byed de/ la la nam mkha' sprin nag por 'gro ba lta bur bai dUr+ya'i mdog can de
40b3(mdo sde): rnams 'gro bar byed/ lha'i mchog de dag kha cig ni 'di ltar rgyan sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / cha byad sna tshogs dang / dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs kyis dga'
40b4(mdo sde): gtam sba zhing na mkha' khyab par byas nas tshal chen po ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// lha'i mchog gzhan kha cig ni gser gyi sa gzhi'i lam nas rab tu 'gro/ 'gro ba de
40b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis shing 'bum phrag du ma'i mu khyud kyis gser gyi rdung bslang ste/ nam mkha' khyab par byas nas 'dug go/ gang gis na mkha' de skya bor byed kyang lha rnams la
40b6(mdo sde): 'gro bar mi byed kyang / lha gang 'chi ba'i dang nye bar 'gyur ba de rnams kyi gdong ngam/ gos de la ni bgo bar byed do// lha gang gzhan dag gis rdul de mthong zhing / mchis
40b7(mdo sde): ltas mthong la/ de 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' med par gyur pa mngon par mthong nas/ de snying rje rje lta bur gyur pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar tshig su bcad de smras pa//
40b8(mdo sde): bud shing lta bu yul 'byung dang // mes bsregs lta bur 'chi 'gyur ba// lam 'di nas ni lha rnams dag/ brgya'am yang na stong du 'dong // 'chi ba gzhan gyi
41a1(mdo sde): mthong 'gyur ba// bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ste// phyis nas nyon mongs zad pa dang // bdag nyid kyis ni sdug bsngal rig/ bag med pa dang /
41a2(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i sems// yul la rtag tu mngon par dga'// lus can lhan cig skye gnas pa// 'chi ba btan par mi rig go// bag med pa la mngon dga' zhing // bde ba
41a3(mdo sde): nyams dga' byed pa na// 'chi bdag sde'i sa 'drangs pa// rab tu 'joms te drug dang 'dra// 'chi ba'i zhags pas bzung ba yi/ khyod la skyob par byed med de// sman
41a4(mdo sde): dang sngags dang las mi skyob// de bzhin lha min lha mi skyob// rdul rnams kyis ni gdong g.yog pa// bdag nyis ni mi rigs te// 'di ni 'che 'pho'i pho nya yin// shi
41a5(mdo sde): ba phyi nas thob par 'ong // gang zhig bde ba'i don ma mthong // skye bo rtag tu rkam chags shing // sred pas ngoms par mi myong ba// blo bur du ni 'chi bar 'gyur// 'chi
41a6(mdo sde): bar btang ba chen po 'di/ khyod kyi pho nya dang po ste// 'di'i 'og tu 'chi ba yang // shin tu mi zad 'byung bar 'gyur// tshal dang nye ba'i tshal brgyan pa// rang gi las kyi
41a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu spyad// sems can ri bo mchog de nas// dbang med bcings te khrid par 'gyur// myos pas rtse bar gnas pa dag/ de bas ngoms ni mi myong zhing // rmongs pa/
41a8(mdo sde): sred pas ma gos pa// dbang med sa steng ltung bar 'gyur/ ji ltar rtag tu me dag las// ngu bsngar ni 'byung 'gyur ba// de ltar 'chi ba'i rtags byung ste// bris nas 'ching
41b1(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur// de ltar lha de bag med pa/ chung ba la gnas shing sems sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la goms pa yin la// lha de'i bar chad de thos nas/ bdag nyid dang /
41b2(mdo sde): lha de rjes su ston par byed do// de ltar lha de'i gtam smras pa na shing rta la zhon pa/ shing rta sna tshogs la zhon shing / shing rta dril bu g.yer ge'i dra bas bkris pa lus cha byad du
41b3(mdo sde): mas 'bar ba/ mig rgyas pa lta bur 'dug pa/ lha'i phreng ba dang gos gyon pa/ gser btsems rnam par brgyan/ gang ri rab kyi rtse mo stong snyed du phye mar klog cing 'ong ngo //
41b4(mdo sde): de nas lha de lha'i tshogs rnams rtog cing ba de bzhin du/ la la ni nam mkha' la/ la la ni sa la/ la la ni bya'i shing rta rnams kyis/ la la ni lha mo dang lhan cig glu len
41b5(mdo sde): bro rdung zhing 'ong ste/ tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de dag lha'i pad+ma dang / shing ljon pa dang / chu bo dang / bya dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / kun nas mchog
41b6(mdo sde): tu nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal gyi phyogs ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/ lha na sdug na gnas pa'i lha de rnams shing rta'i mchog de dag la zhon nas gser gyi ljon
41b7(mdo sde): pa nyi ma lta bu yod pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo // gang gzhan par snang la rgyu ba de dag kyang bar snang de la babs nas/ bskyed mos tshal de ga la ba yod pa der 'dong ngo // de ltar
41b8(mdo sde): lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad 'dus nas sil snyan gyi sgra dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dga' bar byed yongasu spyod par byed de/ phan tshun grogasu gyur cing /
42a1(mdo sde): phan tshun 'gyed pa dang / phra dog la skyo ba med pa rnams gro gar byed/ dgod par byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do// sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa
42a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rgyud dang / rnga dang / sil dkrol dang / gling bu'i sgra dang / glu ste rnam pa 'di lngas kha zas nu bor ltar 'bab pa dang btung ba chu bor ltar 'bab pa'i ngos su/ lha dang
42a3(mdo sde): lha me'i tshogs de dag phan tshun dga' zhing lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal der brtsegs nas/ gang na bai dur+ya dang / gser dang 'bras bu yod pa 'bras bu mdog dang dri zhim pa
42a4(mdo sde): ro mngar ba/ sbrang rtsi lta bu rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/ de shing ljon pa'i drung de dag tu yang 'dod pa'i nyam dga' ba'i lha mo gzugs mtshungs pa med pa'i
42a5(mdo sde): gzugs rnams dang ldan cig 'bras bu'i ros myong nas/ yun ring du dga' bar byed do// de nas de ltar bde ba la gnas shing rgyags pas myos pa'i lha dang lha me'i tshogs
42a6(mdo sde): de rnams bro gar dang / glu dbyangs dang / dgod pa'i sgra de dag thos shing / gang lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis rjes su 'gro ba phyi bzhin du 'brang ba de rnams sgra de dag thos nas/
42a7(mdo sde): lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi drung du dong nas/ brgya byin la gsong por smras shing / thal mo sbyar nas mgo bo la gtug
42a8(mdo sde): te brgya byin la snyed pa/ lha'i dbang po 'di ltar blta na sdug na gnas pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad bskyed mos tshal du dga' sprod bgyid du mchi na/ lha'i dbang po de dag mkhyen par
42b1(mdo sde): mdzod cig/ de nas brgya byin de dag las tshig de thos nas/ lha rnams la 'di ltar lta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha dag gang nas dong ba'i skyed mos tshal du bdag cag kun 'dong gis
42b2(mdo sde): khyed rnams 'dong par shoms shig ces ske'o// de nas brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas/ chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang shing rta rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can la zhon/
42b3(mdo sde): la la gser gyi shing rta srog shing bai dur+ya las byas pa/ ba dan btags pa rnams la zhon/ la la bai dur+ya'i shing rta srog shing gser las byas pa rnams la zhon/ rin po che sna bdun
42b4(mdo sde): bkra shing ba dan sna tshogs kyi mdzes par byas pa rnams la/ la la gser gyi bya sgra snyan cing shin du mdzes par 'byung ba'i shing rta rnams la zhon/ la la rta khra bo 'gros 'chang zhing
42b5(mdo sde): bde ba dag la shing rta blangs nas/ shing rta de rnams rta de rnams la btags te/ rta'i shing rtas 'gro bar byed/ de ltar gzhan yang gser gi bya dang ba rkang pa ni bai dur+ya/ sgo ni pad+ma ra ga'i
42b6(mdo sde): mdog lta bu rnams kyi steng du zhon nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lhan cig tu blta na sdug gi grong khyer chen po gsal ba dang / bskyed mos tshal ga la yod pa der yang 'dong bar byed do//
42b7(mdo sde): yang lha gzhan dag rin po che sna bdun gyi rma bya lha'i gzugs dang ldan zhing / mdongs kyi tshogs kyi khyebs pa gang mi'i 'jig rten na yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin na/ lha'i 'jig rten
42b8(mdo sde): na lha gzhan dang / mi 'dra ba legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa lta smos kyang ci dge to de dag gi mdog cing dbyibs legs pa dpe' bya bar yang mi nus pa'i steng/
43a1(mdo sde): du zhon no// rnam pa de lta bu ldan pa de dag la gzhan dag zhon nas blta na sdug gi bskyed pos chal dang / nye ba'i chal ga la ba der dong bar byed de/ lha'i tshogs de rnams rol po'i/
43a2(mdo sde): sgra dang / klu dbyangs sna tshogs kyis dgod cing rtse la/ yongasu spyod pa dang / lha gzhan mos shing 'khod pa rnams bskyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// lha'i rgyal po brgya
43a3(mdo sde): byin gyi shing rta bzhi yang 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang legs par ldan par/ shing rta rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ an da rnyil dang / pad+ma ra ga dang / sdug
43a4(mdo sde): shin du gsal dang / bai dur+ya dang / byi ru dang / rdo rje dang / shel dang / la la gser gyi khye'u rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa/ shing rta'i mchog de la brgya byin zhon pa nas/ rin po che sna bdun
43a5(mdo sde): gyi bya dad pa gser gyi pad+ma ltar rgyas shing dbyibs dang cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sgra chen po gdangs snyan pa 'byin pa de'i drung na/ lha mo'i dbyangs kyang snyan par mi 'gyur
43a6(mdo sde): ba stong gis khrid do// brgya byin gyi shing rta rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa dang ba rnams kyis khrid par byed do// shing rta de la yang tshon rtsi'i sna tshogs bsgyur ba'i phan lnga brgya/
43a7(mdo sde): bai dur+ya dang / gser dang dngul las byas pa ma btogs so// phan gyi kha dog ni 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / btsod kha dang / dmar po dang / dkar pos mdzes
43a8(mdo sde): par byas pa yin la/ shing rta de la lha'i rgyal po de zhon nas/ lha me'i tshogs du ma ni nye ba na glu dbyang len/ lha 'bum phrag du ma yang mdun du song nas glu dbyangs len cing
43b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' la yang dang yang du 'gro/ sa la yang dang yang du 'gro ste/ gar dga' bar byed pa ci dga' byed pa/ lha'i bde ba de la nye bar spyod cing / sil snyan yan lag lnga dang
43b2(mdo sde): ldan pas nyams dga' bzhin du/ grong khyer blta na sdug dang / bskyed mos tshal ga la ba der dong bar byed do// der 'dong pa na lha'i tshogs gzhan dag gis mthong nas/ blo
43b3(mdo sde): gar byed gad mo dgod / rtsed mo rtso/ rol mo byed cing pad+ma sna tshogs stong byed bai dUr+ya las byas pa dag lag tu khyer nas/ lha'i rgyal po rgya byin lha rnams dang lhan cig gang /
43b4(mdo sde): nas mngon par 'ong ba der blta na sdug pa nas gnas pa'i lha'i de rnams kyis kyang bskyed mos tshal nas byung nas 'ong ngo // de nas brgya byin gyis bdag gi drang 'dir 'ong gi
43b5(mdo sde): khyed kyis 'di dag dang brtse ba de byas pa'i rigs so zhes kyang bsgo'o// de nas brgya byin gyi kha nas tshig thos pa spyi bos blangs nas blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha ga la ba/
43b6(mdo sde): der chu blang ba'i phyir brgyug so// lha mo'i nang nas lha mo dag kyang blta na sdug na gnas pa'i nang du chu blang ba'i phyir rgyu gos so// lta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha mo dang / chos
43b7(mdo sde): bzangs na gnas pa'i lha mo dag kyang gang nas phan tshun rgyug go// der ltar lha rnams phan tshun du gser gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag blangs nas/ bskyed mos tshal de ga la bde
43b8(mdo sde): rgyag sa de dag pan rgya ldan cig tu nang ci ces gyu'o// lha'i rgyal po gyi zin par snang 'i rgya zhi 'dug pas kyang / lhang ba ma rnams mi tog ku su ta
44a1(mdo sde): ngag mthong ngo // lha de rnams rdu la yun ring du rtse ste/ de nas yang mchog ste pad+ma la rtse bar byed do// lha dang lha mo de dag phan tshun pad+ma la rtse bar byed de/
44a2(mdo sde): la la gser gyi pad+ma rnams kyis/ la la bai dur+ya dang gser gi sdong ba rnams kyis/ la la sdong bu sna tshogs rnams kyis rtse ste/ de ltar phan tshun yun ring du bstags
44a3(mdo sde): shing brtses nas/ 'bras bu'i cha la ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// de dag gis 'bras bu skye ba rnams blangs nas/ phan tshun stegs 'dod pa 'phen par byed do// 'bras bu
44a4(mdo sde): la rtse ba de yang byas nas/ tshang tshing gi tshal ga la ba yod pa der 'dong bar byed de/ tshal der song nas ngan pa'i skyon dang bral zhing 'khrug pa med pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin ro zhim pa/
44a5(mdo sde): las ji ltar byas pa bzhin du zhim pa dag la 'thung bar byed do// lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas/ lha'i kun dga' ra ba der ste/ de dag
44a6(mdo sde): gi nang du 'dug go// lha'i rgyal po de rnams kyi mthong nas/ phan tshun kun yid dga' ste/ lha'i rgyal po la mchod pa byed do// /
44a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i tshes dran pa nye bar bzhag pa/ bam po sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de ltar kun gyis thal mo spyi bor sbyar te/ mchod pa byas nas/
44a8(mdo sde): 'di ltar lha'i dbang po bzhugs pa bdag cag gi srog gi 'bras bu mchis pa lags te/ lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ni gang bdag cag gi srog gi 'bras bu mchis pa lags te/
44b1(mdo sde): lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ni gang bdag cag gi pha ma dag pas lhag par srog gsol pa lagaso zhes smras nas/ de ltar brgya byin de lha rnams kyis legs par mchod do// de nas
44b2(mdo sde): yang lha de dag la 'di skad ces khyod ni bdag gi bu dang 'dra dpun dang 'dra zhes smras nas/ de ltar de dag phan tshun legs par byas te/ de nas yang bag med pa'i sar zhugs
44b3(mdo sde): nas/ bag med pa de nyid na gnas so// de nas yang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dge bya'i tshogs kyi sgra 'byin pa/ 'bab chu dang krung chang tshing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/
44b4(mdo sde): gser gyi chu bo pad+ma'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal mdzes par byas pa/ sa gzhi mnyam zhing 'jam pa mi rtsub pa/ mthon man gyi brgyan pa/ bai dur+ya dang / gser dang / dngul dang /
44b5(mdo sde): shau gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa/ bza' ba dang / btung ba ru bo ltar 'bab cang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ me tog man dA ra ba dang / pad+ma la sogs pa me tog chen po
44b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis mdzes par byas/ tshang ring rnams kyi nang na lha'i mi dang / bud med dgod rtse rtse/ rgal rgal yongs su spad pas bsten pa'i tshang tshing tshal dang / bskyed mos tshal rnam
44b7(mdo sde): su lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dang / lha'i kha zas dang / lha'i yul lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang dga' bar byed do// de nas yang lta na sdug nas
44b8(mdo sde): gnas pa na/ chos bzangs na gnas pa na/ chos bzang na gnas pa dga' bar byed pa rang gi gan su zhug so// de dag der zhugs nas kyang ji srid du 'dod pa yid du 'ong ba byas
45a1(mdo sde): @#shing sngags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do// de dag bris lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang las nyeg
45a2(mdo sde): ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi mi rnams dang
45a3(mdo sde): skal ba nyam par mi'i nang du skyes nas las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu shin tu bde bar 'gyur zhing / rig pa'i blo dri ma med pa dang rol mo la dga' ste/ gru dbyangs dang / dgod
45a4(mdo sde): pa dang / rtse ba la dga'/ rtag tu spro ba la dga' zhing / bza' ba dang btung ba dang bca' ba dang bza' bar bya ba mang po la dga' ba dang / yams kyi nad med cing rims nang
45a5(mdo sde): med la/ mya ngan dang bral bar 'gyur bar mthong ngo // de nas dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par sman pa shes pa de/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par
45a6(mdo sde): byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas phyogs gcig gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar
45a7(mdo sde): 'gyur snyam nas/ de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas btags nas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'byor pa yang shin du chung zhing dman par gyur pa gang gis gzhan dag las no/
45a8(mdo sde): rdzas kyi rnam pa 'am/ kha zas dag blangs te/ shin du sdug bsngal yang bu dang chung ma 'ba'i shig la mi sbyor bar sems yongasu bsgoms pa'i yid kyis nor rdzas sam/ kha
45b1(mdo sde): de gzhan du sdug bsngal zhing pha rol gzhan dag nyon mongs pa dang / long ba dang dbul ba dang / mgon med pa rnams la bgo ba sha byas nas sbyin par byed pa dang / srog chags
45b2(mdo sde): gzhan gi chung ma la khrigs pa'i dga' bas rab tu chags pa dag/ gzhi de mngon par gzung ste/ srog bcad pa nyon mongs pa thob cing go shed ma'i lag tu skur ba/ lho phyog
45b3(mdo sde): kyi sgo nas khrid de srog bcang bar gyur pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i nang du chud pa las thar par byas na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten byeg
45b4(mdo sde): cig nas gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang legs par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i las shin tu rgya che ba byas shing / yang dag par spang ba/
45b5(mdo sde): de rang gi lus las kun nas 'od 'byang ste/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od 'byung ba bzhin no// yang 'od de dag gi kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / btsod ka dang / ljang khu dang /
45b6(mdo sde): dkar por 'byung ste/ lha de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi 'od gsal ba de de dag thams cad de nas yang bcu gyur pas lhag par gsal bar byed// dper na bza' dang skar ma'i 'od
45b7(mdo sde): kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gsal bar byed la/ de nas yang zla ba'i 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du lha de'i rang gi lus 'od kyis lha'i gnas de dag thams cad brgyan pa de bzhi/
45b8(mdo sde): rnam par gsal bar byed do// 'od des gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang pa'i lnga de la lha'i de dag gis mngon par brtags te/ rnam pa de lta bu'i khyad par gang gi drung du
46a1(mdo sde): lha gzhan de dag srin bu me khyer bzhin gsal bar byed do// lha'i ris der lha de skyes ma thag tu lha mo de dag thams cad lha ga la ba der rgyug cing skyes pa
46a2(mdo sde): thag tu rgyan thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'di lta ste/ rang gi gtsug gi nor bu 'thon ka chen po'i 'od kyis dpag tshad dag du 'od snang bar byed pa bzhin du/ 'od
46a3(mdo sde): gang gis gzhan mtho ris na gnas pa'i 'od de dag thams cad dang / ci rol gi nor bu de dag thams cad de ltar zil kyis gnon par byed/ ji ltar nyi ma shar bas srin bu me
46a4(mdo sde): khyer rnams kyi 'od zil kyis gnon par byed pa de bzhin du/ lha de dag zil gyis gnon par byed do// de nas skyes ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi cod pan dpag tshad
46a5(mdo sde): brgyar 'od 'phro ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'od kun gyis brgyan cing 'od zer 'byung ba la gang gi 'od sngon po dang / ser po dang / btsod ka dang / ljang khu dang / dkar po
46a6(mdo sde): ngag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi mgul brgyan dpag tshad brgyar 'od 'phro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar de'i 'og tu de rin po che sna bdun gyi
46a7(mdo sde): brgyan 'phreng bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu 'phreng ba byang ba rdo rjes brgyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rked pa'i 'phreng brgyan ji lta bur skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyuraro//
46a8(mdo sde): de'i 'og tu de'i lham rin po che sna bdun gyis sbas pa/ 'od sna tshogs dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shugs gang gis rim pa 'di lta 'gro ba ni/ gang gi tshe lha
46b1(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag che ge mo zhig tu na mkha' las 'gro ba snyam du bsams na/ sems bskyed ma thag tu lha yul du byung ba'i lham nges lha de btag ste/ nam mkha'
46b2(mdo sde): la khyer gnas gnas der 'gro ste/ lus ngal ba med cing gnod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// gang de'i 'og tu de'i gos thag su btags pa ma yin pa rin po che
46b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs las byas pa 'od gsal ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gang gi 'od kyis lha'i ris nyams dga' ba de/ de nas shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur ro// lha de skyes ma
46b4(mdo sde): thag tu 'di snyam du sems te/ las byas pa gang gis bdag 'dir skyes zhi gu snyam nas/ des btags na las legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i gzhi 'jam
46b5(mdo sde): bu'i gling de nas bdag shi ste/ der gang bya ba legs par byas pa 'am/ nyes par byas pa de 'dir nye bar spyod par 'gyur te/ der bdag gis legs par byas pa'i
46b6(mdo sde): las kyi rgyu des bdag 'dir skyes te/ rgyu med pa ni ma yin+da no snyam mo// de de ltar bsams pa dang thang cig tu lha mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa ji snyed pa/
46b7(mdo sde): thams cad nye bar byed de/ de dag gi rgyan gyi sgra ji ltar mi yul na sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa de dag gi sgra 'byung ba de ltar de rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do//
46b8(mdo sde): de dag gi dri yang dpag tshad gnyis su gang bar 'gyur te/ dri gang gis me tog thams cad kyi dri zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ de dag gi gzugs dang lang rtse
47a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing 'jam pa dang / dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur la sman gyi gos kyi yon tan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lwa
47a2(mdo sde): legs par byas pa'i las des 'di lta ste/ nyi ma shar ba'i nyi ma'i kyis me tog thams cad rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ba de ltar lha de'i 'od byung bas/ lha mo de dag
47a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi gzugs rab tu rgyas par 'gyur te/ de dag dang de phrad nas 'jam zhing dga' ba dag gis rtsed ma byed do// de dag gis de pang du blangs te/ tshal
47a4(mdo sde): dang nye ba'i tshal ga la ba de nyid du 'gros sdug gus khyer cing lha'i mdun du sil snyan sna tshogs dang / dgod pa'i sgras dga' byed pa de dag lha la lha zhing tshal dang / 1
47a5(mdo sde): bar tshal de dag ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// lha de'i gnas su tshal 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te 'di lta ste/ pad+ma rmad byung gi tshal yod de tshal de ni gang gis
47a6(mdo sde): tshe lha'i 'jug pa de'i tshe/ gom pa 'dor ba'i sa dag la pad+ma sdong po ni bai dUr+ya/ myug gu rdo rje snying po ni gser/ lo ma ni 'jam zhing 'dab ma 'jam pa dang / bung
47a7(mdo sde): ba'i tshogs mdzes par byas pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag la lha de'i rkang pa gnyis 'jig par byed do// de nas rkang pa bdeg pa/ pad+ma gzhan dag 'byung
47a8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / snga ma zhum par 'gyuraro// de bad+ma'i tshal de nas sdang ci'i chu'i tshal zhes bya ba sbrang rtsi'i tshu tshal ga la ba der dong bar byed do// tshal de'i ni lci'i ni
47b1(mdo sde): ljon pa gser las byas pa de dag thams cad las lha'i rgun tshang 'dzag ste/ lha'i rol mo dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgun chad de dag la lha'i mchog de 'thung bar byed do// myos/
47b2(mdo sde): pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sbrang rtsi de dag la lha de rnams 'thung bar byed do// dri dang ro sngon ma byung ba de dag la 'thung nas kyang / tshal gsum mdzes shes bya ba gang la ba der
47b3(mdo sde): 'dong bar byed do// der gsum mdzes pa dpe med pa 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste bya dang bung ba'i tshogs sgra 'byin pa dang / gzhan yang mi 'dra ba'i sgra dang lha mo rol mo byed
47b4(mdo sde): ba 'byung ngo // lha'i mchog de tshal gsum mdzes pa de na bskyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang / tshal nas nye ba'i tshul dang / pad+ma'i rdzing nas pad+ma'i rdzing dang /
47b5(mdo sde): lteng ka nas lteng kar dga' bar byed rtse bar byed/ dgu' mgur spyod par byed do// bya sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa la nyan cing dbang po lnga yul lnga la tshim pa med pa'i
47b6(mdo sde): yad sred pa'i mes sreg pa ni/ ji srid du de'i legs par byas pa'i lam ma zad pa de sred du dga' bar byed do// de las de zad nas de nas yang lha'i ris de nas
47b7(mdo sde): 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang las kyi thag pas bcings pa rang gi byas pa'i las rnams kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi nang
47b8(mdo sde): du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi so so yang dag par myos par 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams kyis nang du skyes na/ las de dang rgyu 'thun par de gzugs dang rig
48a1(mdo sde): dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs shing kun nas mchog tu bde ba dang / ldan pa dang rab dang 'bring la ba las 'che zhing gzhan la rag ma
48a2(mdo sde): mas pa dang / rang 'dod pa bzhin spyod cing nang med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang tshir ma med pa dang / shin tu 'byor pa dang / de bzhin du gsum ldan gyi dus su la/
48a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du gtso ba'i nang du'am/ de bzhin du rgyal srid phyed dbang ba 'am/ rgyal tsha ba 'am/ tshong pa 'byor ba'i mchog nor dang / 'bru dang gser dngul thams cad dang /
48a4(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong ma las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed do//
48a5(mdo sde): de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas shing gseb nas gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag
48a6(mdo sde): las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas btags na/ gang gi rkun po chad pas bcad pas 'os pa bzung ba/ gang 'jig rten pa
48a7(mdo sde): rol la 'jigs pa'i bsam pas de chad pas mi gcod cing gnod par mi byin cing / pha rol gzhan gyis rkun pos bzung ba de la sems can la phan 'dod pa dang / byams
48a8(mdo sde): par gzhon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i bsam pa'i thar par byed pa/ ma la yang mal cha dang / na ba'i rkyen gyis gsos sman dang / yo byad smin par byed cing gang ma'i rdzas
48b1(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa de dag rku ba'i sems kyis mi rku ba dang / tshig 'jam zhing tshig nyung ba pham par smra ba dang / nyin cig bzhin du sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal zhing / sangs/
48b2(mdo sde): rgyas la sros sam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa dag phul te phyag 'tshal la/ de'i yon tan yang rje su dran pa dang / bla ma la lus kyis kyang gus par byed cing / myur du ldang /
48b3(mdo sde): ba dang / gus par phyag 'tshal ba dang / rtag tu snyan par smra ba dang sdig pa'i grogs po mthong na shin du 'dre bar mi byed la/ de dag dang lhan cig dga' ba dga' 'gro
48b4(mdo sde): ba dang phrag pa dang / mngon par smra bar mi byed/ mi nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'phags pa ma yin pa/ 'jig rten pas spangs pa ma yin pa/ rnam dang lhan
48b5(mdo sde): cig dga' bar mi byed la/ thad kar lta zhing 'dug par mi byed pa dang rgan po la logs par lta ste/ rgan pa shes pa dang ldan pa sems can la byams shin pha rol
48b6(mdo sde): gdung bar mi byed pa/ 'jig rten kun gyis bkur ba/ snyan par smra ba/ 'jam por smra ba dag la snyen bkur byed cing / yang dag par rnam par 'byed pa'i
48b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyang yod pa dang / bran po dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'chis pa rnams la rgyu med par 'tsho bar mi byed pa dang / bza' ba mang du mi za ba
48b8(mdo sde): dang / 'dod dgur 'gro ba'i tshul du mi byed/ gnod pa'i tshul med pa dang / blo bur du mi 'khrugs pa dang / shan pa dang / nye tshong dang / khyi yis 'tsho ba dang /
49a1(mdo sde): skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas ji ltar kha nas blugs te gtor ba de bzhin du/ da ltar gyi mi rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / lha ma yin
49a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ gal te dge ba dang mi dge ba spyod pa'i mi 'byung ba dag de ltar tshul khrims phyogs cig pa cung zad pa dang / lus kyi rlung zad dag gi
49a3(mdo sde): chung zad srung ba de'i tshe/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye la/ kha cig ni lha rnams
49a4(mdo sde): kyi nang du skyes te 'di lta ste/ shing ljon pa a spu min pa dag la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas 'dom gyis ma mkhyud pa dag gang / a mra rab tu smin pa'i 'bras bu de dang /
49a5(mdo sde): de dag tung bar 'gyur la/ gang ma smin pa de dag ni ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dge ba 'dres par spyod pa'i mi rnams kha cig ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye la/ kha cig
49a6(mdo sde): ni sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe thams cad du chos ma yin pa'i skye dgu pal cher 'byung ba/
49a7(mdo sde): mar mi 'dzin par mi 'dzin/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin/ zam zer mi 'dzin/ rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjesu mi 'jug pa/ lus dang ngag gi tshul khrims cung zad kyang mi
49a8(mdo sde): srung ba de'i tshe/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ de'i
49b1(mdo sde): ne lha ma yin rnams kyi stobs ni 'phel lo// lha ni stobs ni yongasu 'grib po// de la lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed par 'gro ste/ nga nyid rgyal bar nus kyis/ lha
49b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag ni ma yin no// de ltar 'di yid la byos la/ lha rnams chos la 'dab par gyis shig/ chos la yang dag par dga' bas ni 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol kun tu srungs
49b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro// mthu rnams kyi nang na ni chos kyi mthu ste/ gzhan mthur mi snang ngo // de ltar yid la bya ba 'di yid la byos shig/ lha ma yin rnams pham par bya ba la
49b4(mdo sde): rab tu 'bod cig/ de skad sgo ba dang / brgya byin la 'di skad smras so// ji ltar khyod kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin skabs cang mchis te/ ji ltar brgya byin gyis bdag cag
49b5(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa de bzhin no zhes smras nas/ go cha'i tshal ga la ba der go cha bgo ba'i don du 'dong bar byed do// de nas shing de dag las lha rnams kyi go cha ma byed pa dag
49b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ste/ gang gon nas lus mi pa rnams der lhar thams cad song ngo // ji ltar ri'i rtse la gnas pa'i nyi ma 'od dmar por 'char ba de ltar rjed pa na/ ri bo zla ba
49b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de g.yul 'gyed pa'i don du 'gong bar byed de/ de nas yang lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir/ snga ma bzhin du de rnams g.yul 'gyed de/ de nas lha rnam
49b8(mdo sde): so sor gnas te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pa rnams kyis de dag phan tshun grogasu gyur pa'i 'dod chags kyis rab tu myos pa 'di lta ste/ bai dur+ya'i tshal dang / gser
50a1(mdo sde): #// gyi shing ljon pa'i tshal dang / rin po che ke ke ru'i tshal dang / lha'i me tog dang / 'bras bu 'byor pa dang / bya smra sna tshogs 'byin pa/ dga' rnam kyi nang na/
50a2(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pa mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnams par smin pa shes pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi nang lha'i bya ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa la rjesu sems
50a3(mdo sde): par byed de/ bya 'di dag las gang gis kha dog dang / cha byad sna tshogasu 'dug pa dang / sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis nang na bde bar
50a4(mdo sde): 'khod cing / nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed/ rtsa bar byed/ yongasu spod par byed snyam mo// las kyi de kho na zhib mor shes pa de las kyi 'bras bu la rtog
50a5(mdo sde): par byed de/ de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa brtags nas/ ri mo mkha' gla zla ba la sems la g.yo med pa gang gis gzugs sam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ skyed mod tshal mtshon
50a6(mdo sde): rtsi kha dog bzang po sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'dri ba 'di lta ste/ kha dog sngon po dang // ser po dang / dmar po dang 'dres pa rnams kyi rtsigs ngos sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ mchod
50a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khang pa'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi gla za bas shing ljon pa dang / bya dang mi dang / stag dang / rta dang / grong khyer dang / tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang / lteng ka dang /
50a8(mdo sde): bskyed mos tshal dang / pad+ma'i tshal dang / mtsho dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / tsheng brdal dang / gzhal med khang la sogs pa bris pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi byin
50b1(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyis yon bdag rnams kyi lung bzhin du gze bo gla ba las byed pa rnams kyis gzhi snyams pa dang / byugs pa dang gser dang dngul las byas pa dang / zangs las byas
50b2(mdo sde): pa 'am/ de dag la sogs pa gzugs gzhan dag tshon rtsi bzang po dag gis sna tshogasu bris na/ de dag lus dang bral nas bde 'gro lha rnams kyi nang du 'di 'dri ba de bzhin du byar skyeso// /
50b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims spangs pa las sna tshogs byas pa des ri dgas dang bung bar gyur nas dga' bar byed do// de ltar lha rnams kyi las dang / 'bras bu dang 'thun par gyur te/
50b4(mdo sde): ji ltar blun po de rnams kyi las de dag sems bzhin du de dag gi blun por gyur nas/ lha rnams kyi tshal bde ba dang / shing ljon pa dang ri rtse rnamasu bde ba de dag myong
50b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// gang gis ji ltar bzhin spangs pa dang / byugs pa dang / ba glang gi so 'am/ dngul 'am/ gser la sogs pa la gzugs ji lta ba bzhin byas pa ni/ las
50b6(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i gzugs rgya'i 'bu mo lta bur skyes par 'gyur ro// lha de dag kyang rnam mdzes kyi tshal de nas ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byas shing
50b7(mdo sde): bsags pa/ so so yang dag par 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/ lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongasasu bskor bas dga' byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed/
50b8(mdo sde): rtse bar byed de/ lha'i bde ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ro// de zad nas yang 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas las nye bar 'gro ba ji ltar bzhin sems can dpral ba dang /
51a1(mdo sde): yi dwags dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba legs par byas pa'i las mi dang / so so/
51a2(mdo sde): yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bas mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/ legs par byas pa'i las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba/ bde bar gnas
51a3(mdo sde): pa'i bde ba/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal chab du yang dag par 'grub la skye bo du mas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu skyed mos tshal dga' ba dang / rtag tu dga' ston la dga' ba dang /
51a4(mdo sde): rtag tu yid rab tu dga' zhing gzugs dang / brgyan dang / cha byad bzang ba dang / rtag tu bzang ba dang / btung ba dang / kha zas gzhan bca' ba bde ba dang / yang
51a5(mdo sde): dag par ldan pa dang / rtag tu dga' ston la dga' ba dang / rtag tu yid rab tu dga' zhing gzugs dang / rtag tu mal cha'am/ bskyed mos tshal du gnas pa de dag bde
51a6(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa dang / bran dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / 'khol ba dag dang / ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyis/ khras
51a7(mdo sde): bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa la rtogs par byed de/ de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams spyi sa yongasu 'dun gnas pa
51a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skyes par 'gyur skams nas/ de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa rtags nas/ skyes bu dam pa dang /
51b1(mdo sde): ldan par gyur pa gang gis pa la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi yo byad yongasu sbyin la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i las de nyid la 'jog par byed la/
51b2(mdo sde): yang dag par 'jog par byed/ so sor 'jog par byed de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyin pa byin par byed pa dang / srog gcod pa phra mo yang srung bar yin te/ 'bras bu smin pa rul bar gyur
51b3(mdo sde): ba'i nang na srin bu yod par bab tsha nas zas par mi byed la/ gzhan dag za na yang zlog par byed cing dmod par byed la/ de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung / gzhan yang tshul
51b4(mdo sde): khrims la rab tu 'jog par byed do// ji ltar na ma byin par len pa spangs zhes na 'di la ma byin par len pa 'di lta ste/ mtsham su byas par bya ba dang / 'bras bu gsar pa shugs kyi
51b5(mdo sde): khyer de bor nas/ kun dga' ra bar lhung ste bor ba yang spongs par byed la/ gzhan yang zlog cing len pa la dmod par byed/ dge ba'i lam rab tu 'jog par byed/ bdag
51b6(mdo sde): dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas/ shi ba'i 'og tu sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sar skye bar 'gyur te/ yongasu 'du na gnas
51b7(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyo bar 'gyur ro// shing ljon pa cig pu de lhag par mdzes pa yin te/ gang gis tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjesu 'jug pa mi 'byung ba na 'di ltar yang
51b8(mdo sde): lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi spyad pa legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i nang na/
52a1(mdo sde): de'i dri dang mdog dang / me tog dang lo ma dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yin no zhes de brjod par byed do// gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du chos
52a2(mdo sde): ldan shing / chos kyi rjesu 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ba de'i tshe/ shing yongasu sa brtol med tog rgyas par 'gyur zhing / dpag tshad brgyar drir 'byung la/ 'od kyi rnam
52a3(mdo sde): par mdzes te/ gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar ba de'i tshe/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid dga' nas shing yongs 'dus sa brtol yongasu bskor de 'khor
52a4(mdo sde): la e ma 'di ltar yongs 'dus brtol rnams pa thams cad du me tog rgyas pa 'di gor ma chag par 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams dge sbyong du mi 'dzin bram zer 'dzin/
52a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi rgan rabs la mchod pa byed/ rigs kyi rgan rabs la zhugs pa lta zhig ste/ 'di ltar bdag cag gi shing ljon pa 'di rnam pa thams cad du me tog rab tu rgyas
52a6(mdo sde): so mnyam sems so// lha de dag de dang nye bar dbyar zla ba bzhir lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyi gnas par byed do// gang gi tshe
52a7(mdo sde): shing yongs 'dus sa rtol gyi me tog rnam pa phye rgyas pa de'i tshe/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams shin du dga' bar 'gyur te/ e ma 'dzab bu'i gling gi mi rnams gor ba
52a8(mdo sde): chag par tshul khrims 'dres pa la spyod pa la zhugs pa de'i tshe/ shing yongs 'dus sa ba rtol gyi me tog gi rnam par 'dres pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe thams
52b1(mdo sde): cang chos ma yin pa'i skye dgu pal cher 'byung ba de'i tshe/ shing yongs 'dus sa bcol thams cad lo ma dang / 'dab mi snyengs par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin du mdog kyang mi sdug/
52b2(mdo sde): de bzhin du dri yang mi zhim/ de bzhin du 'od du 'od kyang mi gsal te/ dper na dgun khug sna dang sprin gyis 'khrigs nas/ nyi ma'i 'od rab tu dro ba dang ldan pa la/ 'od kyi
52b3(mdo sde): mthu nyams pas sems can rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ shing yongs 'dus sa brtol gyi 'od chung la dri'i rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing / 'od kyis
52b4(mdo sde): gnas par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe shing yongs 'dus na gnas pa'i lha rnams brgya byin la/ lha kye ma shing sa la 'dus rtol 'od chung zhing dri mi 'dab la/ ji ltar sngon mdzes pa dang /
52b5(mdo sde): ldan pa de ltar mdzes pa ma lags te/ gor ma kub par 'dzam bu gling na skye dgu chos ma lags pa bgyid pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi
52b6(mdo sde): rgan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa de dag mchiso zhes snyad do// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyis ska gzugs blangs te/ shing yongs 'dus sa rtol/
52b7(mdo sde): gal ba der lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig yongs bskor nas 'dong bar byed de/ sangs rgyas la shin du gus pa skyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mngon par dran pa na lha rnams
52b8(mdo sde): la 'di ltar shing yongs 'dus brtol 'di thams cad du lom snyengs par gyur pa'i shing yongs 'dus brtol ga la ba der kho bo 'gro yis lha gzhan dag chos shig/ ji ltar bdag
53a1(mdo sde): ni shin du gnas pa'i mchod rten khyer/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs te/ shing gi rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste/ shing de'i drung du bdag bcom ldan 'das
53a2(mdo sde): la lha'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pas mchod pa bya'o zhes de skad smraso// de nas brgya byin gyi tshig lha rnams kyis thos nas/ lha rgya phrag stong du ma dag lha'i dbang po rgya
53a3(mdo sde): byin ga la ba der dong ngo // brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs spyi bo la khyer nas/ shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung na gnas pa'i lha gzhan dag gis rgyang ring po nyid nas
53a4(mdo sde): mthong ste/ shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma rnying par gyur cing / 'od mi gsal la/ dpal dang ldan pa med nas yid shin du lhag par mi dga' bo// de nas brgya byin
53a5(mdo sde): gyis bcom ldan 'das de shing drung du gser gtso ma lta bu'i sa bzhi la bai dUr+ya'i gdan gyi steng du bzhag nas lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa dad pa skyes pa dang / bcas pa'i rim gro
53a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la dri dang / tshal gyi me tog ma li ka dang / man da ra ba dang / pad+ma dag ste/ rnam pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog rnams kyis bkrus
53a7(mdo sde): shing mchod pa byas nas/ brgya byin gyi lha rnams la ji ltar lha dag dad pa yang dag par skyes pa ni ser sna dang bral zhing bag med pa dang bral ba gnas par dga' ba yin te/
53a8(mdo sde): de ltar sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs ni khams gsum pa'i bla ma yin la/ bdag cag gi blam yang yin no// zhes smras so// de nas lhang
53b1(mdo sde): pa skyes pa thams cad sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// de nas brgya byin thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig/
53b2(mdo sde): yongs bskor cing pus mo gtsugs nas 'di ltar tshig su bcad de smras pa// sems can kun gyi gtso cig pa// 'dod chags zhes sdang gti mug bcom// rims nang
53b3(mdo sde): med cing mtshungs med pa// thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshalo// de nas lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyang shing gi rgyal po de yongasu bskor nas 'khod de/ thams cad
53b4(mdo sde): dad pa yang dag par skyes nas/ thams cad dbang po bzhol ba'i lha kun ji ltar ji ltar sems dang yid dge zhing / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang phal cher mchod
53b5(mdo sde): pa byed pa de ltar shing 'dab ma bye nas kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro// de nas mthong nas/ de ltar phyir zhing yongs 'du sa rtol rim kyi sngon bzhin du me tog rnams pa thams cad
53b6(mdo sde): rgyas par gyur la/ shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'od kyi dpag tshad brgya dag tu mdzes te/ dris ni khyab 'dab ma ni sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar/ bung bas ni nyes par mdzes
53b7(mdo sde): par byas/ grib ma ni bde/ kun nas lha'i tshogs kyis ni gang / nyi ma gnyis pa ltar ni mdzes/ de sngon gyi dpal de dag mthong nas lha rnams dga' bar 'gyuro//
53b8(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgya dag du dri 'byung ba ldang ste/ dri yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / shing gi rgyal po 'od kyis mdzes pa yin no// dper na ri bo stong phrag drug bcu thams cad kyis
54a1(mdo sde): nang na ri rab mdzes pa de bzhin du/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyi nang na/ shing yongs 'dus brtol de bzhin du rnam par mdzes shing / kun du snang la lhan ne ba
54a2(mdo sde): yin no// de nas yang dpal rdzogs shing dpal shin du rgyas la/ dpal 'bar te kun nas kyang 'od rab 'bar ba na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga'
54a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// phan tshun du lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi spyan mtshungs pa med pa'i mthu la ltos/ gang du sangs rgyas kyi mthus shing yongs 'dus brtol 'di sngon mdog dang /
54a4(mdo sde): dri dang phreng ba dang / lo ma dang / 'od rnams 'od pa ji ltar bar yod de/ ji ltar 'phel ba de ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang gor ma chag par stobs dang /
54a5(mdo sde): mthu dang / rdzu 'phrul byas pa yang che bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu gling gi chos kyi rje su 'jug pa rnams kyang chos la blo gros 'jug ste/ chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa de dag da
54a6(mdo sde): ltar nye bar 'jug pa ni/ bdud kyi sgrub pa'i stobs rab tu med par 'gyur zhing / bdud kyis ris kyi lha ma yin dang / klu 'jig rten skyong ba chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa dag
54a7(mdo sde): chos la bgegs byed par mi 'gyur/ chos la dmed pa byed par mi 'gyur la/ lha mo rnams kyi nang du lha bdag zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur te/ shing gi rgyal
54a8(mdo sde): po 'di mthong bas bdud kyi stobs ni nyams shing / lha'i stobs ni rab tu 'phel bar khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig ces smras so// de nas brgya byin gyi sngon du
54b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i lha rnams de ltar phan tshun gtam yang dag par brjod pa na/ de nas yang chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag 'dzam bu gling na
54b2(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dun sa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// de nas shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drang na lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas
54b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang ba dang / yid rab tu dang ba dang rang gi 'od zer 'bar ba gsal bas mchod pa byed pa na/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis rgyang
54b4(mdo sde): ring po nyid nas mthong ngo // de nas de dag gi drung du phyin nas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ smras pa/ 'di ltar/
54b5(mdo sde): lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa dgyes par mdzod cig/ da ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyis rje su 'jug pa'i mi rnams chos ni spyod/ chos ma yin pa ni mi spyod do// mar
54b6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa/ par 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams chos spyod kyis dges par mdzod cig/
54b7(mdo sde): de nas de dag la thos nas/ lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa yid dga' ba mchog tu dga' ste/ de nas yang 'jig rten skyong po dag la mchod nas/ 'di ltar mi'i
54b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten na mi chos dang ldan pa rnams 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis kun dga' ba'i skye bar gyur cig/ de nas lha de dag thams cad kun dga' ba skyes par rig nas shing
55a1(mdo sde): yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blangs pa la de nas yang mchod nas lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der sangs
55a2(mdo sde): rgyas khyer ro// lha gzhin lhag ma gang yin pa de dag ni shing yongs 'dus ga la ba der dong ste phyin/ brgya byin gyi 'dun du 'gro ba yid rab tu dga' ba/ rnams shing
55a3(mdo sde): yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ shing gi rgyal po de'i drung du dbyar zla ba bzhi'i bar du lha'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga'
55a4(mdo sde): bar byed/ yongasu spyod par byed de/ lha yid rab tu dga' ba lha me'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dga' bar yongasu spyod par byed cing / bde ba dpe med pa nye bar
55a5(mdo sde): myong bar byed do// de ltar de nyid na gnas pa dbyar zla bzhi 'das pa na/ de dag gi nang nas las dang tshe zad pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar
55a6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang nye bar 'gro ba gang ji lta ba bzhin/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan
55a7(mdo sde): grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las mi dang / so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ro// mi dag dang bskal pa mnyam par mi rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/ las
55a8(mdo sde): de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag gzugs bzang zhing shin du lta na sdug pa dang / yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ rtag tu bde bzhing byad bzhin kun gyi blta bar mngon par dga'
55b1(mdo sde): ba dang / rtse ba la dga' bar 'gyur/ rtag tu dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang dga' zhing bud med thams cad kyis blta bar mngon par dga' ba dang / shin du
55b2(mdo sde): bde ba ldan te/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal tshab du 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
55b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi sa la rtogs par byed de/ de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
55b4(mdo sde): der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing sems can gzhan la
55b5(mdo sde): phan par 'dod pa'i sems yongs sgoms pa'i snying rje dang ldan pa gang gis/ yon tan mchog dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ shes rab dang ldan pa
55b6(mdo sde): 'am/ nad pa la zin tsam byin pa 'am/ bdag nyid kyang srog gcod par mi byed la/ shing ljon pa'i gseb na grog sbur 'am/ srog chags ma ko ta ka 'am/ sems
55b7(mdo sde): kyi rnams pa de lta bu gzhan dag la/ ba lang rdzi'am/ phyugs rdzi'am/ rnga mong gi rdzi 'am/ glang po che'i rdzi'am/ de bzhin gzhan bung ba'i rdzi'am/ rta rdzi dgun gyis
55b8(mdo sde): dus sam/ dgun slad kyi dus su grang bas nyen te/ 'brog dgon pa dag tu phyin nas/ me bus na skyes bu dam pa sems can la phan par zhugs pa des me de chu'i mthal/
56a1(mdo sde): bas bzhi par byas nas/ srani bu de dag thar bar byed pa dang / gzhan srog gcod pa byed pa 'am phyir zlog par byed do// bdag nyid kyang mi byed la/
56a2(mdo sde): gal te byas pa zhig yod na yang / de smod par byed de/ so sor chags par byed/ gzhan la yang rjes su yid rang bar mi byed/ skyon du grangs par byed/ 'jog par mi
56a3(mdo sde): byed lam bde ba la rab tu 'jog par byed/ de ltar rnam pa de dag dang / rdul de dag gis srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no// ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin snyam
56a4(mdo sde): na/ 'di la ma byin par len pa mi len pa yin no// ma byin par len pa mi len pa'i rnam pa du yod snyam na/ 'di lta ste/ dgun dang dgun sdang grang ba'i dus su shing
56a5(mdo sde): skam po med pa/ shing ljon pa med pa'i dgon par lam du zhugs pa de na ba lang rdzi 'am/ glang po che'i rdzi 'am/ rnga mong gi rdzi grang bas dag gis me bud pa'i phyir ram/ mtshan mo
56a6(mdo sde): bsro bar bya ba'i phyir ba lang gi lci ba 'am/ glang po che'i lci ba 'am/ lo ma 'am/ 'dab ma 'am/ shing bu dag spangs te bzhug pa de dag la lam tu zhugs pa grangs pas
56a7(mdo sde): shin du nyen par gyur kyang / pha rol gyi yin no snyam du bsams nas/ rku ba'i sems kyi len par mi byed/ pha rol len pa yang bzlog par byed/ gal te bdag gis
56a8(mdo sde): blangs na/ de chags par byed la/ phyir zhing mi byed/ gzhan dag kyang lam dge ba la rab tu 'jog par byed/ gzhan gyis blangs pa la yang rjes su yid rang bar mi
56b1(mdo sde): byed las kyi nyer bsdogs dang / las kyi 'jug ma byin par len pa las byung ba zlog par byed cing / bdag nyid kyang mi byed pa yin te/ sdig pa'i las rdul phran tsam
56b2(mdo sde): gyis kyang 'jigs par lta ba'i skyes bu dge ba de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha 'jig rten sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lhar 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du
56b3(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ro// 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i sa de yang 'di lta ste/ dngul gyi sa bzhi la gser rnams kyis bkra bar brgyan pa yin te/ de ltar sa de las kyi
56b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang 'thun par mdzes/ gser gyis 'gram de yang bkra bar brgyan/ dngul gyis bkra bar brgyan pa yang de bzhin bkra bar brgyan/ de bzhin du ke ke
56b5(mdo sde): rus bkra bar brgyan pa dang / de bzhin du rdo rje mang pos bkra bar brgyan pa yin te/ de ltar sa de las kyis 'bras bu dang 'thun pa rnam par mdzes pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi
56b6(mdo sde): smras shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa rnams kyis nyes par mdzes par byas pa yin no// sdug par byas pa/ kun nas ri dgas dang / bya sdug pa rnam pa sna
56b7(mdo sde): tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ri dgas dang / bya'o kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'gram khyebs pa/ tshal dang nye ba'i tshal yang rin po che sna bdun rnams pa du ma dag gis nye bar mdzes
56b8(mdo sde): par byas pa yin no// de nas tshal de na 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i lha shing gseb na/ mkhod pa rnams lus kun gser gtsoms brgyan cing / lha mo brgya phrag
57a1(mdo sde): stong gis yongs bskor ba/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/ de dag rnam pa ji srid du/ 'gram/
57a2(mdo sde): gang dang gang dus gnas shing rin po che gang gis brgyan pa de srid du lus thams cad kyi kha dog du gyur te/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa de rnams kyi 'od kyis thams cad brgyan pa yino//
57a3(mdo sde): shing ljon pa de dag gi drung du song nas bde ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams dga' bar byed/ yongs su spod par byed do// de ltar de dag gis dga' byas nas/ lha mo de rnams
57a4(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu'i tshal ga la ba der dong bar byed do// 'bab chu'i tshal de yang kun nas gser gyi shing ljon pa 'gram na skyes pa rnams kyi khyabs pa yin te/ shing
57a5(mdo sde): ljon pa de rnams kyi lo ma ser por khyebs pa'i 'od kyi 'bab chu kun nas chu gser du gyur te/ de dag drag tu 'bab kyang de dkar po nyid du mi mngon no// shing ljon pa rnams kyi
57a6(mdo sde): bsapa gseb na lha mo dang cig dga' bar byed/ yongasu spyod par byed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar shing ljon pa rnams kyi yan ga dag rdol nas/ bdag
57a7(mdo sde): cag rnams kyi chang zhim po 'byung bar gyur cig snyam mo// de nas sems skyed ma dag tu shing ljon pa de dag rdol nas/ lha rnams kyi dge ba'i las de dag gis
57a8(mdo sde): chang ro dang / mdog dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag byung ste/ shing ljon pa'i yal ga dag las 'bab po// de bab pa na lha dag gis mngon par mngon par mthong
57b1(mdo sde): nas/ snod rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bcus te/ rin po che'i snod rnam pa sna tshogs thogs nas/ de dag 'thung bar byed de/ lha'i nang bde ba des brgya snyed du
57b2(mdo sde): myos so// chang des myos pa rnams bud med mthong ba'i bde ba sred pa'i mes kun nas sreg pa byed kyang / bsreg so snyam du mi sems te/ bde bas sgrib pa rnams
57b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' med do// de nas yang lha de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ji lta ji ltar thos pa rnams shing yongs 'dus brtol ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ shing gi
57b4(mdo sde): rgyal po de'i drung du dbyar zla ba bzhi'i bar du lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par rnams kyis dga' bar byed/ yongasu spyod par byed de/ lha yid rab tu
57b5(mdo sde): dga' ba lha me'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dag dga' bar yongasu spyod par byed cing / bde ba 'bi med pa nye bar myong bar byed do// de ltar de nyid na gnas pa dbyar
57b6(mdo sde): zla ba bzhi 'das pa dang / de dag gi nang nas las dang tshe zad pa'i lha gang yin pa dag pa de dag lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyi nye bar 'gro ba gang
57b7(mdo sde): ji ltar bzhin/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan myong bar 'gyur
57b8(mdo sde): ba'i las mi dge/ so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bas/ mi dag dang bskal pa mnyam mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/ las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu
58a1(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing shin du lta na sdug pa dang / yid rab dga' bar tu 'gyur/ rtag tu bde zhing byang bzhin kun gyi lta bar mngon par dga' ba
58a2(mdo sde): dang / rtse ba la dga' bar 'gyur/ rtag tu dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba la dga' zhing bud med thams cad kyis blta ba la mngon par dga' ba dang / shin du
58a3(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan te/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal tshab du gyur pa mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes des/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
58a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi sa la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
58a5(mdo sde): der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas btags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing sems can gzhan la
58a6(mdo sde): phan par 'dod pa'i sems yongasu bsgoms pa'i snying rje dang / ldan pa gang gis yon tan mchog dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ shes rab dang ldan
58a7(mdo sde): ba 'am/ nad pa la zan cig tsam byin pa dang / bdag nyid kyang srog gcod pa mi byed la/ shing ljon pa'i gseb na grog sbur 'am/ srog chags ma kro ta ka 'am/
58a8(mdo sde): sems can gyi rnam pa de lta bu gzhan dag la/ ba la rdzi 'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am/ rnga me gi rdzi'am/ glang po che'i rdzi 'am/ de bzhin gzhan bung ba'i rdzi 'am/ dgun
58b1(mdo sde): smad kyi dus su grang bas nyen te/ 'grogs dgon pa dag tu phyin nas/ me bus na/ skyes bu dam pa sems can la phan par zhugs pa des me de chu 'am thal bas zhi
58b2(mdo sde): bar byas nas/ srin bu de dag thar bar byed dang / gzhan srog gcod pa byed pa 'am phyir zlog par byed/ bdag nyid kyang mi byed la/ gal te byas pa zhig yod na
58b3(mdo sde): yang de smod par byed/ so sor chags par byed/ gzhan la yang rje su yi rang bar mi byed/ skyon du bgrang bar byed/ 'jog par mi byed/ lam bde ba la rab
58b4(mdo sde): tu 'jog par byed/ de ltar rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag gis srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no// ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin snyam na/ 'di
58b5(mdo sde): la ma byin par len pa mi len pa yin no// ma byin par len pa mi len pa'i rnam pa de yod snyam na/ 'di lta ste/ dgun dang dgun spang grang ba'i dus su shing skam
58b6(mdo sde): po med pa shing ljon pa med pa'i dgon par lam du zhugs pa de na ba lang rdzi 'am/ glang po che'i rdzi'am/ rnga mong gi rdzi grangs pas nyen pa dag gis med phyir ram/
58b7(mdo sde): mtshan mo bsro bar bya ba'i phyir ba ldang gi lci ba 'am/ lo ma 'am/ 'dab ma 'am/ shing bu dag spangs te bzhag de dag la lam du zhugs pa de grang bas shing du nyen
58b8(mdo sde): bar gyur kyang pha rol gyi yin no// nyams dga' ba rtag tu dga' bar byed pa'i rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs bdagagis mnyan por bya'o snyam mo//
59a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa//
59a2(mdo sde): dam po sum bcu bzhi pa// // de ltar sems bskyed ma thag nyid du dge ba'i las nges
59a3(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra shing ljon pa rnams las 'byung ste/ shing de dag rlung gis bskyod par byed do// de dge sbyong pa na lom de dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ste/
59a4(mdo sde): 'di ltar sil sman yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i snyan pa/ sgra sman sil zhes byed pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de lta bu'i sgra shin du thos par 'gyuraro// sgra de dag thos nas
59a5(mdo sde): kyang lha de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar da ni shing dag las bdud rtsi 'byung bar gyur cig snyam mo// de ltar sems bskyed ma thag bu nyid du ji ltar bzod
59a6(mdo sde): ra ba kha thur du snyan pa rnams kyi nang nas kha ra 'am/ kha ra'i dum bu kha dog dpe med pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba de bzhin du shing ljon pa rnams las bdud rtsi 'byung ste/ de dag
59a7(mdo sde): lha rnams za bar byed do// des tshim nas glu dbyangs dang / sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung ba rnams nye bar len bzhin du rin po che'i sa ga la ba der lha'i mig mi 'dzum par rdzu
59a8(mdo sde): ba rnams 'dod par byed do// de dag rin po che'i sar dong nas phan tshun grogasu gyur pa/ 'dod chags lhar 'dzin par sems pa yin te/ der yid
59b1(mdo sde): zhugs pa der dga' bar gyur pa/ de dang 'thun pa'i spyod pa dang / dga' ba'i lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed//
59b2(mdo sde): dga' mgur spyod par byed do// tshal de nas yang kun nas tshal zhes bya ba der 'gro bar byed/ 'dong bar byed do// tsha la de nas bya'i rigs bdun la 'di lta ste/
59b3(mdo sde): gser gyi dang po dang / kha cig rin po che sna bdun lta bu dang / rma bya ne gtso kha dog sna tshog su 'dug pa/ kha cig an da rnyil lta bu dang / bya ka ran dang kha
59b4(mdo sde): cig ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu dang / kha cig bai dUr+ya lta bu dang / dur ba kha cig an da rnyil lta bu yin la/ kha cig ni spug lta bu dang / rma bya kha cig rin po che sna
59b5(mdo sde): bdun lta bu yin la/ kha cig mthon ka lta bu dang / shang shang te'u sna tshogasu 'dug ste/ kha cig ni byi ru lta bu dang / bya ka la bdi rin po che lta bu yin la/
59b6(mdo sde): cig dngul gyi mdog lta bu yin no// de dag thams cad mthong ba bde ba yin no// sgra snyan cing 'jebs pa 'byin pa la mkhas pa yin te/ kha cig nam mkha' la phan
59b7(mdo sde): tshun 'khor lo bzhin byas nas rtse bar byed do// ji ltar lha rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra 'byung ba de ltar yongasu 'byin par byed cing ji ltar lha me'i tshogs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa la
59b8(mdo sde): shin du chags par 'gyur ba de ltar sgra gzhan dag 'byung bar byed do// gzhan kha cig pad+ma'i tshal bung ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa rnams su/ bya mo rnams
60a1(mdo sde): dang lhan cig bcas par dga' bar byed/ skad 'byin par byed do// gzhan dag skams la 'dug nas bya mo rnams dang / lhan cig
60a2(mdo sde): bcas pa dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// gzhan dag gser dang / dngul gyi shing ljon pa 'dab ma sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa
60a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang na/ de'i grib mas lus mngon par brgyan pa rnams rtse bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de ltar byas de dag dga' bar byed do// de nas
60a4(mdo sde): bya de rnams yongasu rtse ba na/ lha de rnams kyis mthong nas/ de nas yang rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang / rnar snyan pa'i yid kyis bya'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pa
60a5(mdo sde): bde bar byas so// de nas lha de dag dang lha me de dag kyang na mkha' la rgyu ba de dag ni nang du zhugs nas/ na mkha' la rgyu zhing rtse bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub
60a6(mdo sde): la gnas pa rnams dang / lhan cig chu'i nang na rgyu skam la rgyu skam la rgyu ba rnams dang / lhan cig skam la rgyu zhing rtse bar byed do// lha de dag kyang lha mo rnams
60a7(mdo sde): dang lhan cig bya de dag dang / de bzhin rtse bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de nas dge slong des lha de dag dang / bya de dag mtshungs par 'dod
60a8(mdo sde): pas sems phrogs shing myos pa rnams la 'di ltar tshig su bcad de smras po// dud 'gro 'dod pa spyod pa dag/ gti mug gis ni spyod pa yin no// de lta bas
60b1(mdo sde): na lha rnams ni// lha dang dud 'gro mtshungs pa yin// bskal pa bzang po thob pa'i mi// bdag med rnams la mi spyod na// de ni mkhas pa zhes brjod de// de las/
60b2(mdo sde): bzlog pa gzhan yino// lha rnams bag med pa yis phrogs// sems can dmyal bar rab tu 'gro// de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams// bag med dug dang 'ang
60b3(mdo sde): bar brjod// blo gzhan bag med rnam dag gis// sngar ni bde ba lta bur mthong // bag med las byung 'bras thob nas// don med de ni phyis gdung ngo // skye bo mkhas
60b4(mdo sde): pa bdag med pa// don kun med par byed mthong nas// de ltar de las gzhan dge ba// gang yin bag med pa rten to// bag med gzhan sdug bsngal zhing // bag yod gzhan
60b5(mdo sde): du bde ba ste// bag med pa dang bag yod dag/ mtshan nyid bsdus te bshad pa yin// gang zhig sdug bsngal 'dod 'gyur ba// de ni bag med rten par byed// gang zhig
60b6(mdo sde): shin du bag med pa// nams kyang bde ba mi thob po// bdag med bral ba dam pa ni// 'chi ba med pa'i gnas su 'gro// gang zhig shin du bag yod pa// dmyal ba'i
60b7(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal mi myong ngo // gal te blo gzhan lha rnams dang // dud 'gro mtshungs par rtse byed nas// lha rnam dang ni dud 'gro dag/ khyad par med pa nyid yin no/
