233a2(mdo sde): du spyong pa'i lha rnams de dag ga la ba der shin du phan tshun mthong bar 'dod pa rnams dong ste/ yid rtag par rab tu dga' ba'i tshal dang / nye ba'i chal rin po che sna tshogs
233a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ gser gi lcug ma 'phyang bas khyebs rnams su ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du phan tshun
233a4(mdo sde): dga' bar byed rtse bar byed dga' 'gur spong byed// de zad dug dang 'dod shugs kyis// rnam pa kun du zin pa gang // 'chi bdag dbang gyur rmongs pa de// skye bo
233a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i me yis nyams// 'chi ba'i tshe na gnyen 'dab dang // 'dzab shes rtsa lag gnyen 'dun dang // bral ba'i sdug bsdang gang byung ba// de ni bshad par mi
233a6(mdo sde): nus so// de'i 'chi ba nye gyur te// ri bo bzhin du ltung ba na// zlog par mi nus stobs ldan pas// mi rnams kyis ni 'dren par byed// sdug pa dang ni 'du 'gyur la//
233a7(mdo sde): rnam pa kun du 'bral bar 'gyur// de ni rig nas lha mchog gi// bag med rnams la chags ma byed// dbang po rtag tu 'dod rnams kyis// 'dir ni nams kyang ngoms
233a8(mdo sde): mi myong // ji ltar mer ni mar lugs bzhin// sred pa rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur// 'di ltar sgo rnams sna tshogs kyis// sred pa'i 'jig rten 'jig byed pa/
233b1(mdo sde): mi rnams rtag tu sems dmyal dang // yi dgas dud 'gro'i nang du 'khyam// 'chi dang skye ba'i phyang mo la// mi mkhas skye bo nyon mongs pa// de ni rig nas sred
233b2(mdo sde): bral te// 'gro ba mchog tu de 'gro'o// rten po cings las te grol ba// mya ngan bral zhing gdon dang bral// gang zhig sred pa'i dbang mi 'gro// de ni rtag tu bde
233b3(mdo sde): bar 'dug/ gang dag gnas skabs thams cad du// ye shes la ni yid nye ba// mkha' pa de ni skye ba yi// sdug bsngal zhags pas de mi 'ching // gang
233b4(mdo sde): dag yid la mtshan ma med// gang dag sred pas ying byung ba// de ni dgon pa'i dri ma bral// bde ba 'byung ba mchog cig thob// gang dag bde la chags
233b5(mdo sde): mi byed// bde sdug las ni grol ba de// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer 'gro// byams pa dang ni snying rje yis// mi rnams rtag du sems ldan pa// rgyu 'bras de
233b6(mdo sde): nyid shes pa de// sdug bsngal zhags las nges par 'byung // gang dag kun du rtogs pa la// yid ni dga' te skyon spangs pa// de dag skyon gyi 'jigs las
233b7(mdo sde): grol// gnas mchog dam par 'gro bar 'gyur// 'du ba dag la 'bral ba yod// lang 'aco la yang rtag tu 'chi// 'tsho ba la yang rtag tu 'chi// bzhi
233b8(mdo sde): 'di dag ni rtag tu gnas// lha yul nas ni ltung ba de// mi zad khad kyis mngon du 'ong // de ni bsam te bag med par/ khyod ni nams kyang rten mi bya// rmongs
234a1(mdo sde): @pa gang yin thabs med pas// bde ba rtag tu rgol byed pa// bye ma rnams las 'brumar ltar// de ni rtag tu rnyed mi 'gyur// bag
234a2(mdo sde): med rtag tu dga' ba gang // de la bde ba'i skal ba med// sdug bsngal shing gi drung cig po// shin du mi zad bag med cing // chos dang chos mni nges pa nyid// 'di
234a3(mdo sde): ste bdag gis khyod la stan/ khyod kyi yid kyis de zung shig/ phyis ni gdung bar ma byed cig/ rmongs pa gang zhig bla ma'i tshig/ phan pa nyid ni 'dzin mi byed//
234a4(mdo sde): phyis te nyon mongs byung ba'i tshe// rang gi sems kyis gdung bar byed// bye ba ther 'bum stong phrag dang // sa ya dang ni dung phyur dag/ grangs med pa'i lha rnams
234a5(mdo sde): ni// bag med pa yis rnam par slus// nges par mi rtag me yi su// skal mthar ri mchog 'di sreg na// dbu ba chu shing ltar bu yi// lha rnams gang zhig smos
234a6(mdo sde): ci dgos// 'dus byas skye dang g.yo ba gang // de ni srid pa cung zad med// gang zhig rtag pa 'am bde 'gyur ba// de'i gnas ni yod ma yin// ji ltar bag med
234a7(mdo sde): pa yis 'phrogs pa yi// gsar byung lha de la ni thabs du mas// brgya byin des ni de skad phan tags kyang // de ltar tshig cig tsam yang ma zin to// de nas brgya
234a8(mdo sde): byin gyis de rig nas 'dug go/ lha des kyang brgya byin de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs la yid chags pa'i
234b1(mdo sde): lha 'bum snyed kyis rgyan pa dang / bya sgra 'byin pa shin du yongs su 'ong ba dag mthong ngo // de lha de rnams kyi mchod cing bde ba du ma dag myong ba ni/ ri'i bsab bse ba de
234b2(mdo sde): ngag na rin po che'i 'od kyi 'phreng ba la lor 'bar ba/ shin du bde ba rnam pa du ma dag mthong ba dang // skyed mos tshal du dga' ba spod 'dong bar byed do// bag med pa rnam
234b3(mdo sde): pa du mas yid phrogs pa// 'dod pa la sems chags pa rnams 'dod pa'i mes sreg pa na/ yid 'byung ba'i rten dbang po lnga las byung ba'i me lce lnga po des sreg par
234b4(mdo sde): byed kyang mi rig te/ dgra ltar mi sngon la/ bshes gnyen gyi gzugs can dgra ma rungs pa de dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do// de ltar lha de ji srid du 'dod pa yid du
234b5(mdo sde): 'ong ba byas shing gsags pa/ so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed/ rtse bar byed dga'
234b6(mdo sde): 'gur spyod par byed de/ dug gi chu bo ded par byed do// de de dag zad nas las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang /
234b7(mdo sde): dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal las legs par byas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rnams kyis nang du skyes na/ de las de dag rgyu de mthun par
234b8(mdo sde): rtag tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / byad gzugs bzang po dang ldan pa dang / yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i rigs su skye ba dang / skye bo thams cad
235a1(mdo sde): kyis bkur ba dang tshe cig gi bar du rgyal ba'i yang gnang chen byed par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras/
235a2(mdo sde): bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis gnas ma
235a3(mdo sde): 'dres pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gi skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rtags na/ dge ba
235a4(mdo sde): sems bzang po dang ldan pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la shin du yid ches pa gang gis/ tshul khrims rnam pa bdun srungs pa sems can la snying rjes rlan pa'i yid dang
235a5(mdo sde): ldan pa sdig pa'i grogs po dang ma 'dres pa/ mi dge ba sprod pa dang lhan cig smra bar byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dad pa dang ldan pa/ yid zhi zhing /
235a6(mdo sde): yid shin du mnyam par bzhag pa/ blo ma yengs shing ma 'dres par gnas pa/ ya mtshan can 'dod nas rigs su mi 'gro ba/ sems can 'dod nas/ rigs
235a7(mdo sde): na rigs su mi 'gro ba sems can thams cad la snyan par smra ba/ dus su smra ba/ bden par smra ba/ bla ma rnams la rim 'gro byed pa dang / dam pa'i
235a8(mdo sde): chos nyan cing lta ba'i ngang tshul can du gyur pa/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims ci nus su srung bar 'gyur te/ de lam du 'gro ba na/ gzhan gyi rtsa 'am yang rku
235b1(mdo sde): sems dag gi len par mi byed la/ sbal ba dang srog chags dun du bla rnams la yang lta zhing / rtog par byed de/ 'di ltar bdag gi de dag gsad par mi
235b2(mdo sde): bya'o snyam mo// gang gi phyir srog chags thams cad kyi tses chen dam pa ni srog yin te/ bzhi de yid la rtse cig tu byas nas/ srog chags rnams la rab tu
235b3(mdo sde): 'bad de srung bar byed do// ji ltar na srog gcod pa spong ba yin zhe na/ kha zas kyi bde bar bya ba'i don du gal te sha 'am/ kha zas bzhan zhig blangs pa
235b4(mdo sde): dang / gang gis de'i srog chag de gzhan du 'gyur ba de yang tsha ba'i rkyen nam yun ring du lon pa'i rkyen gyis srin bus gang la/ srin bu de dag de nas byung na ni gor
235b5(mdo sde): ma chag par 'chi bar 'gyur pas/ bdag ni shi yang sra'o srog chags 'di dag ni mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing / srog chags rnams kyi srog chad par ma gyu ri cig
235b6(mdo sde): snyam nas/ de bdag nyid kyi srog yongs su tong bar byed kyi/ kha zas de dag las srin bu 'byin par mi byed de/ de ltar skyes bu dam pa de kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam
235b7(mdo sde): la 'jigs par lta zhing rgyu tshol ba lhur byed pa yin no// ji ltar na ma byin par len par spangs pa yin zhe na/ de ltar skyes bu dge ba sems can thams cad la phan pa
235b8(mdo sde): spur byed pa de bzhin gyi/ bdag nyid kyi don du yongs su gzung ba de las ma byin par len par 'gyur ro// snyam nas zhing ngam/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ grong rdal
236a1(mdo sde): dag la dga' bar rdzogs pa'i bgrang gi lci ba'i thal ba tsam yang len par mi byed pa yin te/ de ltar ma byin par len pa shin du phra mo
236a2(mdo sde): yang spong bar byed la/ tshul khrims ma 'dres pa ma nogs pa/ sdig pa byed pa skyon med pa la spyod do// de de ltar spyod spyod pa las lus dang bral na bde 'gro mtho ris
236a3(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na ma 'dres pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyuraro// der skyes nas shin du bde ba dang ldan pa/ nyi ma las lhag la rang
236a4(mdo sde): gi 'od dang ldan pa'i lha de las legs par byas shing bsags pa/ so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba de'i 'bras bu lha'i bde ba du ma dag myong bar byed do// lha'i
236a5(mdo sde): 'phreng ba dang gos gyon pa/ lha 'bum snyed kyis yongs su skor ba de/ rin po che sna bdun gyi tshal dang / nags tshal snyen par bya ba rnams kyi nang na lha'i tshogs dang
236a6(mdo sde): lhan cig dga' bar byed do// de ltar shin du bde ba dang / ldan pa yongs su sbyor te/ re 'ga' tshal ro rgya mchog gi sten pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//
236a7(mdo sde): des de mngon par mthong nas lhag par dga' ba skyes te/ lha de rnams kyis mthong ba dang / kye gang gi tshal 'di tshal gzhan dag pas lhag par mdzes la/ me tog
236a8(mdo sde): dang / 'bras bu dang / ri sul dang / sman ljongs dang lteng ka dang / 'bab nu'i ngogs dang / bya sgra 'byung ba dang / sa rnam par phye ba dang / ri dgas las khyad
236b1(mdo sde): par 'phags pa'i rgyu gang yin zhes smras so// sngon gyi lha gzhan zhig gis tshig de thos nas smras pa/ 'di ltar bdag gcag gis gzhan dang gzhan dag las 'di skad
236b2(mdo sde): ces thos te/ 'di ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nga la nu zhes bya ba gling bzhi dang / gling bar ma rnams su lo 'bum phrag du mar spyod kyang 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms
236b3(mdo sde): pa med pa de/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lam nas 'khor los drangs nas/ lha'i 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs te/ de mi'i bgrang ba'i tshul gyis lo 'bum phrag du mar nye
236b4(mdo sde): bar mtsho yang 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med do// de gar yang 'dod pas chog mi shes pa nas lha'i 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs te/ brgya byin gyi sman phyed la 'dug kyang
236b5(mdo sde): mdod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med do// de gang gis tshe snyed mos tshal du dga' spong byed du 'gro la/ de 'dug pa'i dga' spong byed du tshal 'dir 'gro ste tshal 'di na
236b6(mdo sde): yon tan du ma dang ldan zhing / rten pa dang ldan pa yin no// rgyu des nas yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i tshal 'di ni da dung / lhag par nyams dga' ba yin no// rgyal po nga
236b7(mdo sde): las nus/ brgya byin gyi stan la 'dug pas de yang rang gi byas pa'i las zad pa dang / lha'i gnas de nas lhung ngo zhes bdag cag gis gzhan dang gzhan dag las thos te/
236b8(mdo sde): gzhan du na bdag cag gi tshal 'di mngon sum du 'thong ba ni ma yin no// de ltar tshal 'di ni da dung du 'di ltar shin du 'byor pa yin no// de nas lha de rnams kyi tshig de thos
237a1(mdo sde): pa dang / ngo mtshar dang / bral ba rab tu dga' ba'i yid sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed rtse bar byed/ dgar 'gur
237a2(mdo sde): spyod par byed la/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga po du ma dang ldan pa'i yid kyi tshal der 'gro bar byed do// de ltar 'gro ba na de'i bya shin du rtse ba zhes bya ba/ las legs par
237a3(mdo sde): byas pa skul ba de/ lha de la 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa// de'i rgyu ste sred pa yis// 'dod pa rnams la ngoms mi myong // sred pa ngoms pa skyed byed pa// yid
237a4(mdo sde): nyid ngoms par mi byed do// 'chi ba nye bar gnas pa 'di// skye bo kun gyi shes par bya// de bas de'i lan bya ba// thabs rnams kun gyi mi sheso// shin du dus ni ring nas
237a5(mdo sde): kyang // bde ba du ma dag sprad nas// nges par lhung bar 'gyur ba nas// de lta bas na chos la bod// chos cig kho na skyabs kyi mchog/ chos cig kho na rten gyi mchog/
237a6(mdo sde): chos kyi srog ni mtsho gyur lo// chos ma yin pas mchi bar 'gyur// chos spyod chos la spyong byed cing // chos nyid la ni rten byed na// de ni bde las bde 'gyur la//
237a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rjes su mthong mi 'gyur// chos ma yin par spyod pa'i mi// gong tshe chos min ston byed na// sems can dmyal bar de rtag tu// yang dang yang du sdug
237a8(mdo sde): bsngal 'gyur// ji tsam gnas rnams rten pa ni// de tsam rgya byin yul yin la// brgya byin gnas ni gzhan med de// 'di ltar de dag nges pa yin// sum cu rtsa gsum
237b1(mdo sde): kun nas su// gang na lha rnams mchi med dang // log par ltung ba'i las med pa// de ni phyogs 'ga' yod ma yin// rgyu rnams du mar 'gro ba dang // snying nges pa sna
237b2(mdo sde): tshogs kyis// brgya byin chos ni ston byed kyang // lha rnams rten par mi byed do// chos mkhas pa las ko'u shi ka// mdzod yin na lus yin la// pad+ma las ni dga'
237b3(mdo sde): bas na// sdig pa'ang rnam par spong bar byed// de ni dam chos rtag du 'chad// lha rnams kyi pa 'da' yang // bag med pa yis khrugs mi 'gyur//
237b4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ lo ka phrad nya ba ti/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten rten la bzhag pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sdom la/ ri rnam
237b5(mdo sde): dang ni rgya mtsho dang / ngan song rnams dang gling dang shing / klu rnams dang ni mkha' lding dang / rgyal chen 'gro dang 'dun sol rnams/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
237b6(mdo sde): dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ bzhags te de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
237b7(mdo sde): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ ji tsam du stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi
237b8(mdo sde): khams gang zhe na/ ji tsam du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang ba rnams kun tu 'khor zhing phyogs snang ba'i byed pa'i bar yin te/ nyim stong
238a1(mdo sde): @#dang / zla ba stong dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang / shar gyi lus 'phags pa steng dang / lho 'dzam bu gling stong dang / nub kyi bgrang sprong/
238a2(mdo sde): stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams stong dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa stong dang / 'thab bral stong dang / dga' ldan stong dang /
238a3(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' stong dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni stong spyi phud gyi khams zhes bya'o// stong
238a4(mdo sde): gnyis pa bar mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ stong spri phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi
238a5(mdo sde): khams zhes bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ stong gnyis pa bar mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/
238a6(mdo sde): stong gnyis pa 'a ma'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa zhes bya'o// snang gsus kyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang shon/ stong gnyis papar ma'i 'jig rten gyi
238a7(mdo sde): gang yin pa de la bu stong la ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
238a8(mdo sde): khams rnams/ shar phyogs su mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa'ab zhig par gnas shing 'chags pa chags par gnas pa/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig
238b1(mdo sde): par gnas pa/ gzhan 'chags shing / gzhan chags par gnas so// dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams lho dang / nub dang /
238b2(mdo sde): byang phyog su 'tha' med cing mu med la 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am/ chags par gnas pa ste/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan 'jig par
238b3(mdo sde): gnas la/ gzhan 'chags shing / gzhan 'chags par gnas so// dge slong dag dper na bar mar char 'bab pa'i 'bru shing rta'i srog shing tsam 'bab ste/
238b4(mdo sde): chu'i rgyun rnams rab tu 'bab na 'tshams sam/ bar chad med par de bzhin du/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa/ shar phyogs su
238b5(mdo sde): de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'tha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing / chags pa 'am chags par gnas
238b6(mdo sde): te/ gzhan 'dzag cing gzhan 'jig par gnas lo/ bzhan chags shing bzhan chags par gnas pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs su de snyed
238b7(mdo sde): kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ zhig par gnas shing / chags pa 'am chags par gnas te/
238b8(mdo sde): gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la/ gzhan chags shing gzhan chags par gnas pa dag kyang mthong ngo // zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das nang /
239a1(mdo sde): du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang gi nang du gshegaso// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu lan chen po 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus/
239a2(mdo sde): par gyur te 'dug go// de na tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu ya na chen pos dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par snyan
239a3(mdo sde): pa dang / ji ltar shing rta'i srog shing gi dpes snyan pa 'di ni legs te/ ngo mtshar s+ho// de la stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rin po che nyis stong yod de/ ri
239a4(mdo sde): 'am rgyal po ri rab stong dang / khor yug gi ri stong rnamaso// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nang ngan song gsum yod de/ sems can dmyal ba stong dang / dud
239a5(mdo sde): 'gro stong dang / yi dwags stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling chen po bzhi stong yod de/ shar gyi lus 'phags po stong dang / lho 'jam
239a6(mdo sde): bu gling stong dang / nub pa glang spyod stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong rnam so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ shing chen po bzhi sa dang / 'dzam bu gling
239a7(mdo sde): pa'i shing 'dzam du bzhi stong dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi shing shal ma ri mthon po stong dang / lha ma yin gyis ris kyi rjed ta pa tra li stong dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
239a8(mdo sde): pa'i sa rtol stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i rigs stong yod de klu'i rigs sgo nga las skyes pa stong dang / mngal las skyes pa
239b1(mdo sde): stong dang / drod gsher las skyes pa stong dang / rdzus te skyes pa stong rnams// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ na mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong yod do//
239b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding gi rigs sgo nga las skyes pa stong dang / mngal nas skyes pa stong dang / drod gsher las skyes pa stong dang / rdzus te skyes pa stong rnams so// stong
239b3(mdo sde): spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi stong yod de/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung stong dang / 'phags skyes po stong dang / mig mi bzang stong
239b4(mdo sde): dang / rnam thos kyi bu stong rnam so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'gro ba lta ba stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang yi
239b5(mdo sde): dwags dang / lha dang mi'i 'gro ba stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dun sa chen po nyis stong yod de/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang
239b6(mdo sde): stong dang / lha ma yin gyi 'dun sa nor bzang stong rnamaso/ 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshig dang po'o// sdom las/ skye nas ri dang rol mtsho dang / de bzhin
239b7(mdo sde): sems can dmyal rgyad gzhan/ sems can gnas dgur rab bshad de/ las lam cu po de bzhin no// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dod pa'i
239b8(mdo sde): skye gnas gsum yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pas nye bar gnas pa rnams la dbang phyug
240a1(mdo sde): gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste mi kha cig dang lha rnams so// 'di ni skye gnas dang po// sems can 'dod pas sprul pa dag
240a2(mdo sde): yod de gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste bzhin 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnam so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas
240a3(mdo sde): gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyis sbrul gang dag 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste gzhan 'phrul dbang
240a4(mdo sde): byed kyi lha rnamaso// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum pa'o// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bde ba'i skye gnas gsum yod de/ sems can gang
240a5(mdo sde): ngag lus 'di nyid la dben pa la skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bar brlan par byed cing yongs su rlan par byed do// yongs su tshim par byed cing yongs su khyad
240a6(mdo sde): par byed pa dag kyang yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas rlan par byas shing yongs su rlan par bya ste/ yongs su tshim par
240a7(mdo sde): byas shing yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde ba la reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba dang bde ba la gnas pa de tshe ring thung yun ring por gnas s+ho// 'di lta ste
240a8(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lha rnam so// 'di ni skye gnas dang po'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas rlan par byed cing
240b1(mdo sde): yongs su dran par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed/ yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid las skyes pa'i bde ba dang / bde bas/
240b2(mdo sde): rlan par byas shing yongs su dran par byas te/ yongs su rim par byas shing yongs su khyab par byas nas bde ba la reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba de
240b3(mdo sde): dang bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun por gnas te/ 'di lta ste 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can
240b4(mdo sde): ngag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pas bde ba rlan par byed cing yongs su rlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing yongs su khyab pa dag yod do// de dag
240b5(mdo sde): lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pas bde bas rlan par byas shing yongs su rlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing yongs su khyab par byas nas bde bar
240b6(mdo sde): reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang bde ba la gnas pas tshe ring zhing / yun ring du gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni bde
240b7(mdo sde): bar skyes pa gsum pa'o// stong chung ngu 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gser gyi ri chen po bdud stong yod do// ri'i rgyal po gnyi shi 'dzin stong gshol 'da'
240b8(mdo sde): 'dzin stong dang / seng ldeng 'dzin stong dang / lta na sdug stong dang / rta sna 'dzin stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin stong dang / ri'i rgyal po rnam pa bdun stong dang /
241a1(mdo sde): stong nu ngu'i 'jig rten 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mtsho chen po bdun stong yod de/ gnyi shing 'dzin gyi mtsho stong dang / gshol
241a2(mdo sde): 'da' 'dzin gyi mtsho stong dang / seng ldeng can gyi stong dang / lta na sdug gi stong dang / rta sna'i stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin gyi stong dang / rnam pa bdun gyi
241a3(mdo sde): mtsho stong ngo // stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba chen po rgyad pa stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos stong ngo // theg
241a4(mdo sde): nag stong dang sdus 'joms stong dang / ngu 'bong stong dang / ngu 'bod chen po stong dang / cha ba stong dang / rab tu tsha ba stong dang / sems can dmyal ba mnar
241a5(mdo sde): med pa stong ngo // stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gyi gnas dgu stong yod de/ sems can gzugs yod pa lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad /
241a6(mdo sde): pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste mi rnams dang lha kha cig ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dang po'o// sems can gzugs yod la lus tha dad pa 'du shes cig
241a7(mdo sde): ba dag yod ste/ 'di lta ste tshangs ris kyi lha dang po byung ba gang yin pa dag te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can gzugs phong pa/
241a8(mdo sde): lus cig la 'dus shes cig pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste 'od gsal gyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gas gsum pa'o// sems can gzugs
241b1(mdo sde): yod pa lus cig cing 'du shes cig pa yod de/ 'di lta ste dge rgyas kyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bzhi pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa 'dra/
241b2(mdo sde): shes med cing 'du shes dang bral ba dag yod de/ 'di lta ste 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas lnga pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa
241b3(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams la yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams med par gyur cig/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed
241b4(mdo sde): pas nam mkha' mtha' yaso snyam nas na mkha' mthu yas skye mched sgrubs nas gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du 'gro ba'i lha rnams
241b5(mdo sde): te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas drug pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnams pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par 'das te/ rnam
241b6(mdo sde): par zhes pa mtha' yaso snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched smrabs nas gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i
241b7(mdo sde): lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bdun pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par
241b8(mdo sde): 'das nas/ ci yang med pa'o snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched sgrubs nas gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i
242a1(mdo sde): lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas brgyad pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched la/
242a2(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched sgrubs nas gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste 'du shes med 'du shes med ma ni skye mched du nye
242a3(mdo sde): bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dgu pa'o// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi dge bcu'i las kyi lom dag yod de/ srog cod pa dang
242a4(mdo sde): ma sbyin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig rkyal ba dang / rnab sems dang / gnod sems
242a5(mdo sde): dang / log par lta ba rnams so// srogacod pa shas cher kun du sten cing sgoms te/ lan mang du byas pas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro//
242a6(mdo sde): de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shes yang bas ni rab tu tsha ba'o// de bas ches shes yang ba dang / de bas ches yang ba ni tsha ba'o// de bas ches shes
242a7(mdo sde): chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bod chen po'o// de bas shas chung ba dang / de bas shas yang bas ni ngu 'bong du'o// de bas shas chung ba dang / de bas
242a8(mdo sde): ches yang bas ni sdus 'joms su'o// de bas shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni thig nag du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang ba ni sems
242b1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa shas cher kun du spen cing sgoms na mang du byas pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /
242b2(mdo sde): rdzun smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / rtsig rkyal ba dang / rnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba shes cher kun du sten cing sgoms na mang
242b3(mdo sde): du byas pa ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shas yang bas ni rab tu tsha ba'o// de bas
242b4(mdo sde): ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang ba ni tsha ba ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shas yang ba ni rab tu tsha bar ro// de bas shas chung ba dang /
242b5(mdo sde): de bas ches yang bas ni sngas 'jim du'o// de bas ches shes rlung ba dang / de bas ches yang ba ni nag du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang ba ni
242b6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gzhan pa las tshig gnyis pa'o// sdom ni mkha' lding las lam bcu po dang / myos pa dang /
242b7(mdo sde): ni bkres dang za/ bdud rtsi phyis char pa dang / mu ge bde tshan cu tshan no// skyong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na klu'i rigs bzhi stong rgya stong mtsho chen po na gan so//
242b8(mdo sde): na mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong zhig shing shal ma ri mthon po la gnas so// sgo nga las skyes pa stong / mngal las skyes pa stong dang / drod gsher
243a1(mdo sde): las skyes pa stong dang / rdzus te skyes pa stong ngo // nam mkha' lding sgo nga las skyes pa ni bza' ba'i phyir klu skong las skyes pa 'byin
243a2(mdo sde): par byed de/ mngal nas skyes pa ni mi 'byin/ rdzus te skyes pa ni 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na gal te de len pa'i de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
243a3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang la nas skyes pa za ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa 'byin par byed de/ drod gsher las skyes pa mi 'byin/ rdzus te
243a4(mdo sde): skye ba mi 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding drod gsher la skyes pa ni klu sgo nga la skyes
243a5(mdo sde): ba dang / mngal la skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa 'byin par byed de/ rdzus te skye ba mi 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin
243a6(mdo sde): du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding rdzus te skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga la skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus
243a7(mdo sde): te skye ba 'byin par byed do// klu la klu chen po skal bar gnas shing sa 'dzin pa dag yod de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nyer dga' gnyis
243a8(mdo sde): dang / klu'i rgyal po rta rgal dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgya'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen
243b1(mdo sde): po dang / klu'i rgyal po me la'ang ba rnams te/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal pos skal bar gnas shing sa 'dzin pa rnamakhar lding dag gis 'byin par mi nus pa gang yin
243b2(mdo sde): pa 'di dag/ lha dang lha ma yin dag gis g.yul myong bar byed cing so sor byur byed de/ shes shing rab tu shes la kun du rab tu shes so// ji skad du shin du mthu che ba'i klu
243b3(mdo sde): yod de/ ma mtha' srangs shing chu na gnas pa ste/ de dag lha min dag dang g.yul 'gyed pas/ 'di dag brgya byin gyi ni dpung yang yin/ stobs kyang che zhing dug
243b4(mdo sde): kyang che ba'i glu shin du drag pa'i dgra thabs sna tshogs can/ lha min rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pa de dag brgya byin gyis ni dpung yang yin zhes 'byung ba lta ba'o//
243b5(mdo sde): bar gyi sdom ni/ dga' bo nyer dga' rta rgal dang / tang gzugs dang ni bzi can dang / yul 'khor srung dang nag po che/ Ta e le'i 'dab ma tha ma yan/
243b6(mdo sde): stong rlung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dge ba bcu'i lam dag yod de/ srog cod pa spong ba dang / ma byin pa len pa spong ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem
243b7(mdo sde): pa spong ba dang / rdzun du smras pa spong ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig rtsub po spong ba dang / rnab sems med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang /
243b8(mdo sde): yang dag par lta ba rnams so// srog cod pa spong ba shas cher kun du sten cing sgoms na mang du byas pa ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam
244a1(mdo sde): par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang ba ni 'phrul dga' ba rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba
244a2(mdo sde): dang / de bas ches yang ba ni dga' ldan pa rnam su'o// de bas ches shas yang ba ni 'thab bral ba rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang
244a3(mdo sde): ba ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su'o// de bas ches chung ba
244a4(mdo sde): dang / de bas ches yang bas ni mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba
244a5(mdo sde): dang phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang / rnab sems med pa dang gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba shas ches pas kun tu rten cing
244a6(mdo sde): sgoms te mang du byas pas ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shes
244a7(mdo sde): yang bas ni 'phrul dga' ba rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shes yang ba ni dga' ldan pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba
244a8(mdo sde): dang de bas ches shes yang bas ni 'tha' bral ba rnams so// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shas yang bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o//
244b1(mdo sde): de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches shas yang bas ni rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs rnams so// de bas ches shas chung ba dang // de bas ches yang bas ni mi rnams dang /
244b2(mdo sde): skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye na yang srog gcod pa spong bas ni tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa spong
244b3(mdo sde): bas ni longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro// 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong bas ni chung ma 'dran zla med par 'gyur ro// rdzun du smras pa spong bas ni skor pa med par
244b4(mdo sde): 'gyu ro// phra ma spong bas ni 'dza'o dang 'byed par mi 'gyur ro// ngag rtsub po spong bas ni yi du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par mi 'gyur ro// tshig rkyal pa spong bas
244b5(mdo sde): ni tshig snyan par 'gyur ro// rnab sems spong bas ni 'dod chags che bar mi 'gyur ro// gnod sems med pas ni zhes sdang che bar mi 'gyuraro// yang dag pa'i lta bas
244b6(mdo sde): ni ti mug me par mi 'gyur ro// bar sdom ni/ skar ba med dang mdza mi byed/ de bzhin yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan pa'i tshig tu gyur pa te/ yi ge bzhi ni rjod par yin
244b7(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin par mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po'i tshe'i tshad skal pa len pa de
244b8(mdo sde): tha chad yin no// dud 'gro myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyis nang ni las kyi 'bras bu sa srung gi bus sa srung gi bu nyid dang / rab rten gyi rab rtan nyid thob pa de tha
245a1(mdo sde): chad yin no// mi skye gnas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni/ las gang gi rnam par smin pas ni/ rgyal po gshin rje'i 'jig rten
245a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang cug la dbang byed pa de tha chad yin no// mi'i skye gnas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni/ las gang gi rnam par
245a3(mdo sde): smin pas nga las nus nyid thob pa de mchog yin no// rgyal chen bzhi pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de rnams kyi nang na ni/ las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rgyal po chen po
245a4(mdo sde): bzhis rgyal srid las dbang phyug byed pa de mchog yin no// sum cu rtsa gsum myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni/ las gang gi rnam par smin pas brgya
245a5(mdo sde): byin gyis rgya byin nyid thob par de mchog yin no// 'thab bral ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na/ las gang gi rnam par smin pas rab tu mtha' bral nyid thob par
245a6(mdo sde): re mchog yin no// dga' ldan myong bar 'gyur bas las de rnams kyi nang na ni/ las gang gi rnam par smin pas yongs su dga' ldan gyi yongs su dga' ldan nyid thob par de
245a7(mdo sde): mchog yin no// 'phrul dga' myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni/ las gang gi rnam par smin pas rab 'phrul gyis rab 'phrul nyid thob pa de mchog yin no//
245a8(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de rnams kyi nang na ni/ las gang gis rnam par smin pas dbang byed cing dbang byed nyid thob pa de mchog yin no//
245b1(mdo sde): ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la kres pa dang skom pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang spyod rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi
245b2(mdo sde): snyan rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams
245b3(mdo sde): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams yang yod do// de yan chad la ni kres pa dang skom pa med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la kha zas 'di lta ste
245b4(mdo sde): 'bras chan dang / zan dang / phye dang sha dang khur ba rnams yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyis lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba grang spyod rnams la yang yod do// /
245b5(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams ni ma smos ma btab pa'i 'bras buHsa lu'i 'bru za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ni 'bri'o// bdud rtsi yang za'o// rgyal chen bzhi ni
245b6(mdo sde): lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /
245b7(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// de yan chang ni khams kyi zas med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ni bdud rtsi ni bzhi ste/ sngon
245b8(mdo sde): po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ni ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang /
246a1(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris
246a2(mdo sde): pa rnams ni med do// de yan chad la med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la gshang ba dang / ci ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnam
246a3(mdo sde): dang / nub kyi ba glang sprod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do//
246a4(mdo sde): ji ltar 'dzam bu gling pon mi rnams la char 'bab 'khas pa dang / char 'bab mi 'khas pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub
246a5(mdo sde): kyi ba glang sprod rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar
246a6(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams lo legs pa dang / mu ge yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba grang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do//
246a7(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams la ni med do/ de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la ni 'jigs pa dang bde
246a8(mdo sde): ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / nub kyi ba glang spod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i
246b1(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul
246b2(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do//
246b3(mdo sde): tshangs ris pa rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshig gsum pa'o// sdom ni nyo tshong mdog dang khar la 'jug pa dang /
246b4(mdo sde): bding ba dang ni bzhag gos dang / yang dang dge dang tha dad dang / bag ma len pa cu tshan yin/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la/ nor ram 'bru 'am/ gser
246b5(mdo sde): ram dngul gyi nyo tshong bya ba yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang spyod rnams la ni yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams dang / rgyal
246b6(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la med do// de yan chad la med do// 'di skad du 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams ni nor dang / 'bru rnams nye tshong byed do// shar gyi lus 'bag
246b7(mdo sde): po rnams ni ras dang byi ru ras rnams kyiso// nub kyi bgrang spyod pa rnams ni ba glang dang nor bu rnams kyiso// zhes zer ba yod do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi ni rnams
246b8(mdo sde): ni mdog nag po dang / dkar po dang / sngo sangs dang / mdog spya nar rnam par bzhi yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang spyod pa
246b9(mdo sde): rnams kyang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams ni mdog cig ste dkar po'o// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams ni mdog cig ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang / dkar
247a1(mdo sde): po rnams so// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta ba de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa/
247a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni mdog cing te dkar po'o// tshangs ris
247a3(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa 'dun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams
247a4(mdo sde): dang / dge chung rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med dge rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang /
247a5(mdo sde): mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin du mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa
247a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa dang / 'du shes med mini skye mched pa ni kha dog med do// ji ltar 'dzam
247a7(mdo sde): bu gling ba rnams kyi khang pa ched du byas pa rnams dang / gzhal med khang pa 'dra ba dang / sa khang rnams yod bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang /
247a8(mdo sde): nub kyi ba glang sprod pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams kyi khang pa ni ched du byas pa ma yin/ las khang dag go/ rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi
247b1(mdo sde): bzhal med khang ni ched du byas pa dang ched du byas pa ma yin pa dag go// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral/
247b2(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang /
247b3(mdo sde): rnams ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa dag go tshangs ris rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du 'og min pa rnams kyi bar du bzhal med khang rnams kyang ched du ma byas pa yin no// gzugs med
247b4(mdo sde): pa rnams la ni khang pa dag med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la ni gding ba dang / bgo ba 'di lta ste/ bal gos dang / sha ni'i ras dang / gso ras dang /
247b5(mdo sde): zar ma'i ras dang / ras gos dang / dar dza ba dang / ko tam pa'i ras dang / tsA du gu la'i gos dang / a pa ran da ka'i gos dang / ras dang / byi'u ras yod pa
247b6(mdo sde): bzhin du/ shar lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub pa glang sprod pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams ni dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos
247b7(mdo sde): dag gon no// ji ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos dag gon pa bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris kyi lha rnams dang sum
247b8(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha yang de bzhin no//
248a1(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni gos gon pa bzhin du skye'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsam gi shing rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste/
248a2(mdo sde): sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang / gzhan gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po rnam so// dpag bsam gyi shing las byung
248a3(mdo sde): ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu skyes pa 'am/ bud med dag gi sems skyed pa dag du de la yal ga 'dud par byed do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi dpag bsam/
248a4(mdo sde): gyi shing rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams so// dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang /
248a5(mdo sde): ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams so// dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu lags/ lha'i bu dag gi sems skyed ma thag tu yal ga 'dud par byed/
248a6(mdo sde): de'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar dag gi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha
248a7(mdo sde): rnams la ni dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la gding ba dang / bgo ba lci ba dang / yang ba yod pa bzhin du/
248a8(mdo sde): shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi bgrang spyod pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos la srang cig
248b1(mdo sde): yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ni srang byed yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni srang gi bzhin cig go/ mthab bral ba rnams kyi rgyang cha cig go//
248b2(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams kyi srang gi cu drug cha cig go// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni srang gi sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi cha cig go// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni
248b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad gyi shing las byung ba'i gos ni srang gi drug cu rtsa bzhi cha cig yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis ni gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// tshangs ris
248b4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi ji tsam bzhin du 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi yang gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong bdul cig go// ri bong bdun la ni
248b5(mdo sde): lug rdul cig go/ lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul bdun no glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma cig go/ sro ma bdun la ni a ba na cig go// a ba na go bdun la ni ba ti tsigo/
248b6(mdo sde): ba ti ka bdun la ni nas 'bru cig go/ nas 'bru bdun la ni sor cig go/ sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la ni khru gang ngo // 'dzam bu gling gi mi kha cig ni khru tshang de ltar rtsis khru phye
248b7(mdo sde): dang bzhi pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams ni khru brgyad pa'o// nub kyi ba glang sprod pa rnams ni khru cu drug pa'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni khru
248b8(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi pa ris kyi lha rnams kyi lus thob pa ni/ rgyang grogs kyi bzhi cha cig go/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi rgyang grags
249a1(mdo sde): byed do// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gsum mo// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi rgyang grags cig go// 'phrul
249a2(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams ni rgyang grags cig dang / rgyang grags kyi bzhin cig go/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyis rgyang grags phye dang gnyis so// tshangs
249a3(mdo sde): pa'i ris rnams kyi dpag tshad do// tshangs pa 'dun na 'don rnams kyi ni dpag tshad cig go// tshangs pa chen po rnams kyi ni dpag tshad phye dang gnyis// 'od
249a4(mdo sde): chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis so// tshad med 'ong ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi'o// 'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad rgyad do// dge chung ba rnams
249a5(mdo sde): kyi ni dpag tshad cu drug go/ tshad med dge ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis so// dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gnyis so// sprin med
249a6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi'o// gsod nams skyes pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad nyis rgya lA cu'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ni dpag tshad lnga rgya'o// 'du
249a7(mdo sde): shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o// mi che ba'i lha lus thob pa rnams kyi dpag tshad stong ngo // mi bdung ba rnams kyi dpag tshad nyis stong ngo //
249a8(mdo sde): gya nom snang ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi stong ngo // shin du mthong ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad rgyad stong ngo // 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lus thob pa rnams ni dpag
249b1(mdo sde): tshad khri drug stong ngo // mi gdung ba rnams kyi gsags pa'i lus med do// nyi zer gdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul cig ni rdul phra rab yin no// rdul phra rab bdun/
249b2(mdo sde): la ni rdul phra mo cig go// rdul phra mo bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul cig go// brgyad par khru gang gi bar du ste/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi kha cig ni khru rgyad pa gyon to/ kha
249b3(mdo sde): cig ni khru cu'o/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams kyi khru nyi shu'o// nub kyi ba glang spyod pa rnams kyi ni khru bzhi cu'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams ni dpag
249b4(mdo sde): bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gros khru rgya cu pa gyo no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang lus la ci ran pa'i gos gyon to// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
249b5(mdo sde): ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'og min gi bar dug gi de bzhin no// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams dbang po tha dad do// kha cig la me'i dbang po dang / kha cig la po'i
249b6(mdo sde): dbang po yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang sprod pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
249b7(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// /
249b8(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni me'i dbang po yang med/ po'i dbang po yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min par dag gi yang de
249b9(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang /
250a1(mdo sde): 6/ dga' zhan pan 5/ bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la bag ma btong ba dang / len pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang //
250a2(mdo sde): nub kyi ba glang spyod rnams yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba/
250a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la bag ma tong ba med/ bag ma len pa
250a4(mdo sde): yang med do/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og man gyi bar dag kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshig bzhi pa'o// sdom ni grang dang
250a5(mdo sde): dus tshigs mtshan mo dang / pha ma dang ni rjes khol dang / nor dang 'bru dang mngon par zhe na/ cu tshan yongs su rjod pa yin/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams shin du
250a6(mdo sde): grang ba dang / shin du tsha ba yod pa bzhin/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang sprod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnam
250a7(mdo sde): la ni med de/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la med do// de yan chad la yang med do/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la dus tshigs 'di lta ste/ dgun dang /
250a8(mdo sde): dpyid dang / dbyar yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang spong pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa
250b1(mdo sde): gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gyi lha rnams la yod do// tshangs/
250b2(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo dang nyin mo yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags
250b3(mdo sde): po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang spod rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral
250b4(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la mtshan mo yang med
250b5(mdo sde): nyin mo yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi bar dag la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la yang pa dang ma yod
250b6(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang spyod rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum
250b7(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la
250b8(mdo sde): yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni pha yang med ma yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'og man gyi bar dag la yang de bzhin no//
251a1(mdo sde): / ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la jo bo dang bran yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / nub kyi ba grang spyod pa rnams
251a2(mdo sde): la yang yod do/ byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams la ni jo bo yang med bran yang med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams ni jo bo dang bran yang yod do/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
251a3(mdo sde): lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan
251a4(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni jo bo yang med bran yang med/ tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min
251a5(mdo sde): gyi bar dag la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la nor dang 'bru yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba grang spong rnams
251a6(mdo sde): la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ni 'bru ni yod la nor ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ni nor dang 'bru yod pa ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i
251a7(mdo sde): lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
251a8(mdo sde): byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni nor dang med 'bru yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du 'og min gyi bar dag la
251b1(mdo sde): mdza
251b2(mdo sde): yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la pa 'am/ ma'am bu po 'am bu mo'am jo bo 'am/ bram 'am nor ram/ 'bru la sngon par zhen pa de bzhin du/
251b3(mdo sde): shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang spyod pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni ci la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// rgyal chen bzhi
251b4(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams la ni 'bru ma rtogs la mngon par zhen pa yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba
251b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni ci la yang
251b6(mdo sde): mngon par zhen pa med do// tshangs ris rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad
251b7(mdo sde): med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa
251b8(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin du mthong ba rnams dang / 'og
251b9(mdo sde): min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten gdags pa las tshig lnga pa'o// sdom ni/ zla mtshan khrag dang khu nu dang / tshe dang nag po chu klung khrag/ sa la
252a1(mdo sde): @rdzing dang glang po dang / srungs ma 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lam/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la bud med zla mtshan can dang sbrum ma
252a2(mdo sde): dang / bu tsa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba blang spyod rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams la yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha
252a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni/ 'dzam bu gling ba rnams kyi ni khye'u 'am/ bu mo lo lnga lon pa ji tsam pa de tsam bzhin du/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo'i phrag pa 'am/ bang par sems can rdzus te
252a4(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur te/ de nas lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am bu mo'o snyam du sems so// khye'u 'am bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du/ 'di ni bdag
252a5(mdo sde): cag gi ma 'am pa'o// snyam du sems so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams ni lo drug lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams ni lo bdun lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no//
252a6(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams ni lo rgyad lon pa ji rtsam pa bzhin no// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis lo dgu lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams
252a7(mdo sde): kyis ni mi rnams kyi khye'u dang / bu mo lo cu lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo drag pa 'am bang par rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can 'byung bar 'gyur te/
252a8(mdo sde): de na lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du/ 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am bu mo snyam du sems so// khye'u dang bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di bdag cag gi pa'o snyam sems so//
252b1(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni thog ma nyid nas yan lag thams cad rdzogs par skye shing 'chi ba na yang de kho na bzhin no// 'og min gyi bar yang de bzhin no// gzugs med pa
252b2(mdo sde): rnams la ni lus kyi gzugs med do// de nas de dag ni skye bar yang mi mngon 'chi bar yang mi mngon no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig
252b3(mdo sde): ba'i chos rten pa ni/ gnyis kyi spor ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang spyod rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal
252b4(mdo sde): chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams khyad pa tsam gyis bdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan pa rnams
252b5(mdo sde): kyi ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam gyiso// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis rgad pa tsam gyiso// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyis ni ltas pa tsam gyis gdung ba
252b6(mdo sde): sel bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris pa rnams la 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'og min gyi bar rnams kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar
252b7(mdo sde): mi rnams la khu chu mi tsang ba yod pa 'byung ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba glang sprod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams
252b8(mdo sde): pa yang de bzhin yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams ni rlung las byung ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab
253a1(mdo sde): bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// tshangs
253a2(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams la 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'og min gyi bar dag kyang de bzhin no// sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi
253a3(mdo sde): tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi skal pa cig te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dud 'gro skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal ba cig ste/ bar ma
253a4(mdo sde): dor mchi ba ni yod do// mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni yi dwags rnams kyi nyin zhag cig te zhag sum cu la zla ba cig/ zla bcu gnyis le cig te/ yi
253a5(mdo sde): dwags rnams ni tshe'i tshad ni rab ni lnga rgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi ltar tsin lo khri lnga stong yod do// shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi
253a6(mdo sde): bar ni lo stong nyis rgya lnga cu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nub kyi ba glang sprod pa'i mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lnga rgya ste bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// byang gi
253a7(mdo sde): sgra mi snyan gri mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyang rab kyi lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni med do// ci'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba med ce na/
253a8(mdo sde): de dag la bdag gi bag med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med de/ tshe nges shing khyad par du 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la bar ma dor
253b1(mdo sde): mchi ba med do// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la ni yang skye ba dang mar 'grib pa yod do// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams res 'ga' ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur/
253b2(mdo sde): la re 'ga' ni tshe lo cu par yang 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi ni lo lnga cu gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag cig go// nyin zhag de
253b3(mdo sde): sum cu la zla ba cig/ zla bcu gnyis la lo cig te/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni sems can dmyal ba'i
253b4(mdo sde): lo lnga rgya ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi ltar rtsi na le bye ba sa ya phrag 'bum drug khri nyis stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo rgya gang yin pa de ni sum
253b5(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag cig te/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba cig/ zla bcu gnyis la lo cig te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i
253b6(mdo sde): tshad kyi rang ni lha'i lo stong ste bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar ci na le bye ba phrag gsum dang / sa ya drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal
253b7(mdo sde): bachen pa thig nag gi can ga gcig po/ nyin nag de sum rgya la zla bcig go// zlab cu gnyis la lo cig te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i chang
253b8(mdo sde): kyi rab ni sems can dmyal ba'i lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar cin lo bye ba phrag 'bum khrag cu gnyis dang / bye ba phrag dgu
254a1(mdo sde): gcig
254a2(mdo sde): drug stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo nyis rgya gang yin pa de ni 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag go// nyin nag de sum cu la zla ba cig
254a3(mdo sde): zla bcu gnyis la lo tsog te/ 'thab bral ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i le nyis sngo ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar cen lo bye ba phrag cu bzhi
254a4(mdo sde): dang sa ya phrag yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po sdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag cig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba cig/ zla bcu gnyis la lo cig te/
254a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba chen po sngas 'joms kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni rab ni sems can dmyal ba'i lo nyis stong te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i
254a6(mdo sde): ltar cin le bye ba phrag cig dang / bye ba phrag 'bum dang / bye ba phrag drug khri rgyad stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo bzhi rgya gang yin pa de ni/ dga' ldan gyi nyin
254a7(mdo sde): zhag de gsum cu la zla ba cig/ zla bcu gnyis la lo cig go// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi che'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i lo bzhi stong te/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do//
254a8(mdo sde): mi ltar rtsi na lo bye ba phrag lnga cu bdun dang / lo sa ya drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi nyin zhag cig/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba cig/
254a9(mdo sde): zla bcu gnyis la lo cig te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor ma
254b1(mdo sde): nama'/ 'a canas ga gdung ma / na smra
254b2(mdo sde): de ni/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag cig go/ nyin zhag de gsum cu la zla ba cig zla bcu gnyis la lo cig te/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni
254b3(mdo sde): lha'i lo rgyad stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar rtsis na le bye ba phrag nyis rgya sum cu dang / lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po/
254b4(mdo sde): ngu 'bod chen po'i nyin zhag cig go// nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba cig/ zla bcu gnyis la lo cig te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i ngu 'bod chen po'i nyin zhag cig/
254b5(mdo sde): nyin zhag sum cu la zla bcu gnyis la lo cig te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i tshe'i tshad kyi bar ni lo rgya stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do//
254b6(mdo sde): de mi'i ltar rtsin/ lo bye ba phrag bye ba drug cu dang / bye ba phrag sa ya gsum dang / bye ba phrag lnga 'bum lnga khri nyis stong yod do/ mi rnams kyi lo stong phrag rgya gang
254b7(mdo sde): yin pa de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi khri rnams kyi nyin zhigacig go// nyin nag de su bcu la zla ba cig zla bcu gnyis la lo cig go// gzhan 'phrul
254b8(mdo sde): dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni lha'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ de mo'i ltar tsin/ lo bye ba phrag drug yod do// de ni sems
255a1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po che ba'i nyin zhag cig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba cig/ zla bcu gnyis la lo tsig te/ sems can dmyal ba
255a2(mdo sde): chen po che ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni rab ni lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar tsi na/ lo bye ba phrag bye ba lnga rgya dang lo bye ba phrag bye ba sum
255a3(mdo sde): cu dang le bye ba phrag sa ya rgyad dang bzhi 'bum dang / lo bye ba khrag khrig drug stong yod do// nga bar sdom ni dgu dang gsum dang cu bzhi dang ni lnga cu rtsa bdun dang / nyis rgya dgu rgya
255a4(mdo sde): rnams ni mi'i grangs kyi lha'i cher bshad/ de bzhin cig dang cu gnyis cig dang rgyad dang drug cu dang / lnga rgya dag ni lha'i grangs kyi sems can dmyal ba'i tshe tshad gshad/ tshangs
255a5(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni skal ba byed// bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa 'dun 'don rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi skal pa cig te bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// /
255a6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba chen po myan rA ci'i tshad kyi bar ni skal ba cig te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa chen po rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal ba phye dang gnyis te/
255a7(mdo sde): bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'od rlung gi lha rnams kyi che'i tshad kyi bar ni skal pa gnyis ni bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// chad med 'o rnams kyi tshe'i chad ni rab ni tshe'i chang
255a8(mdo sde): rab ni skal pa bzhi ste/ bar mo 'chi ba ni yod do// 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni/ skal brgyad de bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge chung gi lha rnams
255b1(mdo sde): kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal bcu drug te/ bar ma der 'chi ba ni yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ bar ma dor/
255b2(mdo sde): 'chi ba ni yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// skyen mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni skal ba
255b3(mdo sde): rgya nyi shu rtsa lnga te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ bsod nams skyes rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal pa nyi rgya lnga cu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ 'bras bu che ba'i
255b4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni rab ni skal pa lnga rgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi rab ni skal ba nyis stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do//
255b5(mdo sde): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni rab ni skal ba bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal pa rgyad
255b6(mdo sde): stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal pa khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ na mkha' mtha' yas
255b7(mdo sde): skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal pa nyi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal
255b8(mdo sde): pa bzhi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal pa drug khri ste bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes
256a1(mdo sde): med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi tshe'i tshad kyi rab ni skal pa rgyad khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'di nas byang phyogs su ri nag po gsum
256a2(mdo sde): yod de/ ri nig po gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na/ ri nag po gsum yod de/ ri nag po gzhan gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na yang ri nag po gzhan gsum dag yod de/ ri
256a3(mdo sde): nag po gzhan gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba yod de/ ri'i rgyal po gangs kyi byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang ba zhes bya ba
256a4(mdo sde): yod de/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang nas dpag tshad bcu'i tshu rol na mche chen po chu zhes bya ba yod de ma gros pa zhes bya'o// mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba de la tshur dpag tshad lnga cu zheng
256a5(mdo sde): du dpag tshad lda cu yod do// khor yug du ni dpag tshad nyis rgya'o// dbyibs legs pa lta na sdug pa mdzes pa chu gsil zhing chu brengs ci ltar bu gang ba/ me tog u ba la
256a6(mdo sde): dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos kun du khyebs par 'dug go/ de'i nang na chu rlung chen po bzhi 'di lta ste/ gang ga dang / sani d+hu dang / si ta dang /
256a7(mdo sde): bag shu dang 'di rnams 'bab bo// gang ga ni shar phyogs nas glang be re'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogs su skor nas rlung lnga rgya dang / lhan
256a8(mdo sde): cig tu shar phyogs kyi rgya mtshor chen por 'gro'o// sani d+hu ni lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste/ 'di ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas skor du nas/ rlung lnga rgya dang
256b1(mdo sde): lhan cig tu lho phyogs su rgyam che chen por 'gro'o// bag shuni nu phyogs nas seng ge'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mche chen po nu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogs su skor nas/ rlung
256b2(mdo sde): lnga yab dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs kyi brgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// sing ti ni byang phyogs nas seng ge'i kha na 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po nu zhes bya ba la g.yas phyogasu
256b3(mdo sde): skor nas rlung lnga rgya dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// ji skad du byang phyogs kha gur 'gyur ba'i rgya mtsho yod de gzhan yang ni/ de ni mtsho chun zhes
256b4(mdo sde): bya/ tha dad rgyun rnams 'byung dogs yod/ chu rlung ga ga si rU pa ga shu dang / si tarba rlabs dru ba'i 'phreng ba can/ chu gang khyab par 'phags pa bzhi 'bab ste/ phyogs
256b5(mdo sde): bzhi dag na kun du rnam par 'bab/ gang ga shar phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba ste/ sin d+hu lho phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba yin te/ pag shu yang ni nub phyogasu rgya mtshor 'gro/
256b6(mdo sde): de'i byang phyogasu rgya mtshor sid ta 'gro/ chu rlung rab mchog bzhi po 'di dag ni/ mchog tu bzang zhing so sor 'bab pa ste/ re re zhing yang lnga rgyu khyer nas ni/ chu'i
256b7(mdo sde): rgyun rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro/ zhes kyang 'byung ba lta bu'o// ri spos kyi ngad ldan de'i byang phyogs su dpag tshad nyi shu na gser gyi brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos
256b8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga cu zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga cu 'khrug du dpag tshad nyis rgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad lnga cu zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga cu 'khor yug
257a1(mdo sde): tu dpag tshad nyis rgya/ 'bang du dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi yod pa/ dbyibs legs pa lta na sdug pa 'dzes shing yod de/ de'i nangs gzhi
257a2(mdo sde): yang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag tab pa/ der yid du 'ong ba shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba
257a3(mdo sde): ngag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i kho ra khor yug du gser gyi brag bya skyibs rgya stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing
257a4(mdo sde): lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste de dag gi nang gi sa gzhi rnams kyang dbyibs legs pa lta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyi chag chag tab pa ste/ de dag du
257a5(mdo sde): yang yid du 'ong ba'i gseg ma dang / gyo ma gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du mthor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/
257a6(mdo sde): zheng du dpag tshad phye dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa gser gyi bye ma bangal cing tsan dan gyi chag chag tab pa yod de/ de yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i
257a7(mdo sde): shing ngam gsog ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos de'i byang phyogs su
257a8(mdo sde): dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa la'i rgyal po rab rtan zhes bya ba sa la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun gyis skor ba yod de/ sa la'i rgyal po rab rtan de'i rtsa ba ni 'dom bcu bzhi mthur
257b1(mdo sde): du zug go// sa la'i phreng ba dang po'i rtsa ba ni 'dom sum cu thur du zug/ gnyis pa ni cu gnyis so// gsum pa ni cu cig go/ bzhi pa ni bcu'o// lnga pa ni dgu'o//
257b2(mdo sde): drug pa ni rgyad do// sa la'i phreng ba bdun pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dom bdun thur du zug go// sa la'i rgyal po rab rtan de'i yal ba dang / lo ma dang / yal ga rnams gang
257b3(mdo sde): yin pa de'i sa la'i phreng ba dang po la thug go// sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po'i yal ga gang yin pa de ni gnyis pa la thu go/ gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni gsum pa la'o//
257b4(mdo sde): gsum pa gang yin pa de ni drug pa la'o// drug pa gang yin pa de ni bdun pa la'o// sa la'i phreng ba bdun pa'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang yal gang yin pa de ni nam
257b5(mdo sde): mkha' khyab par 'dugo// de dag gang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs legs pa lta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cang tsan dan gyis chus chug tab ste/ de yang
257b6(mdo sde): yid mi 'ong ba shing ngam gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyi mthus phyi rol du mdor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng
257b7(mdo sde): du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ de yang yid mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung
257b8(mdo sde): ba dag lhang ni mi ma yin pa rnams kyi klung gi mthus phyi rol du mdor ro// sa la'i rgyal po rab rtan gyis shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab
258a1(mdo sde): ces bya ba tshur dpag tshad ldacu/ kha tshon du dpag tshad ldacu te/ mtho'i skor du dpag tshad rgya dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la/
258a2(mdo sde): mdzes pa chu gsil shing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po khyabs pa yod de rdzing dal gyi 'bab kyi nang gi
258a3(mdo sde): pad+ma'i lo ma rnams te/ zheng mchog tu che te/ 'di lta ste ba glang g.yogs pa rtsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong po rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste gshol mda' tsam mo//
258a4(mdo sde): pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste shin+da rta'i 'phang lo rtsa mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che te/ 'di lta ste skyes bu chen po'i bla rtsa mo// ro
258a5(mdo sde): mngar zhing mchog tu mngar te/ 'di lta ste sbrang rtsi sgrol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go/ rdzing dal gyis 'bab kyi khor khor yug na rdzing bu rgyud yod de/ de dag
258a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang dbyibs legs pa lta na sdug pa chu gsil shing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ngo // de dag gi nang gi pad+ma rnams kyang che zhing mchog tu phye ste/ 'di lta ste ba lang
258a7(mdo sde): yogs pa tsa mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing / mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste gshol mda' tsamo// pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che te/ 'di lta ste shing rtir
258a8(mdo sde): 'phang lo rtsa mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste skyes bu chen po'i rA tsa mo// ro mngar zhing mchog tu mngar te/ 'di lta ste sbrang ma'i sbrang tsi skol
258b1(mdo sde): ba bzhin no/ bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu kha tshon du dpag chad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes
258b2(mdo sde): pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyis chus chag cha gtab pa yod de/ der yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma
258b3(mdo sde): yin pa rnams kyang rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal por g.yul ngor spyad pa rab rtan zhes bya ba gzugs bzang
258b4(mdo sde): zhing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa yod de/ me tog kun mu ti'i mdog ltar thal kar 'dug la/ yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i mgo yang dbyibs
258b5(mdo sde): legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sde zhing dbus srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dmar la che ba drug yo/ de dag thams cad dang gzugs
258b6(mdo sde): bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes la/ me tog ku mu ti'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug pa/ yan lag bdun shin du legs par gnas te/ de dag gi mgo yang
258b7(mdo sde): dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste sngo zhing dbus srog chags lham bu gsher gyi mdog ltar dmar la che ba drug yod pa sha stag te/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab rtan
258b8(mdo sde): de 'khor dang bcas pa dgu zla ba bzhi ni brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas kyi du 'dug/ dpyid zla ba bzhi ni shing sa la'i rgyal po rab rten gyi nang na gnas
259a1(mdo sde): shing du 'dug/ gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab rten drag bya skyibs lA ma yin gyis ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe ni glang po che/
259a2(mdo sde): rgyad stong po rnams 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab rten srung ba dang / rnga ba dang 'dzes par bya ba'i phyir/ brag bya skyibs rgya stong dag gi nang na/ nye bar gnas shing
259a3(mdo sde): 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu rten pa brag bya skyibs lha maM yin gyi nang nas/ shing sa la'i rgyal po rab rtan gyi drung du 'gro ba na res 'ga' ni tha mal gyi
259a4(mdo sde): tshul gyis 'gro/ re 'ga' ni 'di lta ste lha ma 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang rung ba dang 'dra ba bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams
259a5(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo bo 'am/ bya la khar zhor te sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po
259a6(mdo sde): che'i rgyal po rab rtan shing sa la'i rgyal po rabartan gyi drung na gnas shing sa la'i rgyal po rab rtan shing sa la'i rgyal po rab rtan gyi drung na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe ni glang po
259a7(mdo sde): che rgyang sdong po de dag kyang 'di lta ste glang po che rgyal po rab tan srung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir shing sa la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun po de dag gi nang /
259a8(mdo sde): du lta zhing 'khod de/ shing sa li'i 'phreng ba dang po'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta ste 'khod do// gnyis pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de
259b1(mdo sde): dag kyang nang du lta'o// gsum pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod de dag kyang nang du lta'o// bzhi pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod ba de dag kyang nang du lta'o// lnga pa'i
259b2(mdo sde): nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta'o// drug pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang nang du lta'o// bdun pa'i nang na gang dag 'khod pa de dag nang
259b3(mdo sde): du ltas na 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab rtan shing sa la'i rgyal po rab rten nas rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab par 'gro ba na/ re 'ga' ni tha mal pa'i tshul
259b4(mdo sde): gyis 'gro'o// res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang dag rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po ni de dag
259b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa de dag gi mgo'o 'am/ byal khar zhon te sil snyan nam pheg rdob pa dag rgya cher byed cing 'bri'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i
259b6(mdo sde): rgyal po rab rten rdzing dal gyi 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur sprod pa de'i tshe glang po che rgya stong po de dag 'di lta ste glang po che'i rgyal po rab rtan
259b7(mdo sde): de srung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rdzing dal gyi 'bab gyi nang du zhugs nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams te/ shin du bkrus rab tu bshal nas glang po che'i/
259b8(mdo sde): rgyal po rang rten la 'bu'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab rtan gyi zos shing 'thungs te/ 'brangs par gyur pa de dag kyang de'i tshe glang po che gzhan rgya spong po de
260a1(mdo sde): dag kyang rdzing bu rgya stong dag gi nang du rdzing bu re re zhugs nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' 'gur spyod de/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag blangs nas shin/
260a2(mdo sde): tu dkrus te rab tu bshal te b+hU'o/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che la rgyal po g.yul sprad pa rab rtan gyi mthu ni de tsa mo// sems can thams cad kyi
260a3(mdo sde): srungs ma dang bcas shing srung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed pa dang / mi 'bral na de ci'i phyir 'tshe ba dag yod par sems/ smras pa srungs ma mthu chung ba zhig yin na de zil
260a4(mdo sde): gyi mnan nas mche ba dag yod do// srungs ma bag med cing bag med pa la gnas pa zhig yin na/ de'i bag med pa'i rgyu las kyang 'tshe ba dag yod do// srungs ma
260a5(mdo sde): nyis sdoms nas kyang zil gyis mnan nas mche bar byed do// mi rnams chos ma yin par spyod cing mi rigs pa zhig yin na chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang / mi rigs pa spyod
260a6(mdo sde): ba de dag la yang 'che ba dag yod do/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi mi rnams kyi srungs ma 'di lta ste lam po che dang srung dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum sngo dang /
260a7(mdo sde): spos mchong ba'i gnas rnams dang me tog gi 'phreng ba tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong ba gram pa'i gnas rnams dang tung ba mchong ba'i gnas dang / rtag tu myos
260a8(mdo sde): ba'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnamasu bkod pa dag yod do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes rgyad la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi g.yog zho shas 'tsho ba rnams
260b1(mdo sde): lam po che dang / srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dang / spos mchong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong bkram pa'i
260b2(mdo sde): gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig
260b3(mdo sde): rten thams cad la nyul te/ gal te de dag gi rkyen par tshor na de dag gnas mthon po la 'brel gal te de dag gi rkyen par tshor na/ de dag dma' ba la 'god do//
260b4(mdo sde): zla ba phyed kyi tshes cu bzhi la ni rgyal po chen po dag gi bu rnams lam po dang / srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos mtshong ba'i gnas dang / me tog 'phreng
260b5(mdo sde): ba mchong ba'i gnas dang / zong ba gram pa'i gnas rnams dang / tung ba mchong ba'i rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams nas su zhig 'dug ces 'jig
260b6(mdo sde): rten thams cad la nyul te/ gal te de bdag gi rkyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do/ gal te de dag gi rkyen par tshor na ni gnas dma' ba la
260b7(mdo sde): 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes cwo lnga la ni rgyal po chen po de dag nyid lam po che dang / srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos mchong ba'i gnas rnams dang /
260b8(mdo sde): me tog 'phreng ba mchong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / tung ba mchong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams
