261a1(mdo sde): dang / gsod byed kyi gnas su su 'dug ces 'jig rten thams cad du nyal te/ gal te de dag gi rkyen par tsher na ni gnas 'thon po la dgo do//
261a2(mdo sde): gal te de dag gi rkyen pa mtsher na ni de dag gnas smra ba la 'god do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du dge slong dag zla ba phyed kyi tshes co brgyad la ni rgyal po chen po
261a3(mdo sde): bzhi po dag gi g.yog zho shas mtsho ba rnams mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang par 'dzin pa dang / dge slong du 'dzin pa dang bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs
261a4(mdo sde): kyi tso bor rimi 'gro byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par byed pa dang / sbyin pa dag byin zhing
261a5(mdo sde): bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam/ zhes 'jig rten thams cad
261a6(mdo sde): la nyu lo// zla ba phyed kyi chos cu bzhi la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang par 'dzin pa dang / dge slong
261a7(mdo sde): du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rags kyi tso bo la rami 'gro byed pa dang / don byed pa dang bya ba'i rigs pa las byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang /
261a8(mdo sde): tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyi 'jig par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dang byin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims
261b1(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam/ zhes 'jig rten thams cad la nyu lo// zla ba phyed kyi tshes cwo lnga la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag nyid mi dang mi ma yin pa'i
261b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi tso bo la rim 'gro byed pa dang / don byed pa dang /
261b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba spangs 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa
261b4(mdo sde): dang / gso sbyong dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'di 'jig rten thams cad la nyu lo/ gal te mi dang mi ma
261b5(mdo sde): yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar mi 'dzin pa dang / par mi 'dzin pa dang dge slong du mi 'dzin pa dang bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi tso bo mi 'dzin pa dang / don mi byed pa
261b6(mdo sde): dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang sbyin pa dag mi byin zhing bsod
261b7(mdo sde): nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ mi 'dug pa dag mang na ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams
261b8(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i mdun sa chos bzang du 'dug shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin
262a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / bar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi tso bo rim gro mi byed pa dang /
262a2(mdo sde): don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyi 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / byin pa mi
262a3(mdo sde): byin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ mi 'dug pa dag mang na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po
262a4(mdo sde): rnams/ sum cu rtsa gsum par lha rnams chos bzang lha'i mdun sa na 'khod cing nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin
262a5(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten na mar mi 'dzin pa dang / par mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi tso bo la rim gro mi byed pa
262a6(mdo sde): dang / don mi byed pa dang bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa de'i tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kho na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin
262a7(mdo sde): pa dag mi byin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang gso slong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas mi 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes snyad do// de dag
262a8(mdo sde): las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid ma rang zhing mi dga' ma 'gu bar gyur nas/ yi ma rang ba rnams kyang phyir slob par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di/
262b1(mdo sde): ltar mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar mi 'dzin pa dang / par mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim
262b2(mdo sde): 'gro mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa las mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang /
262b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa mang ba ni mi rnams kyi chos
262b4(mdo sde): bzang po ma yin no// rkyen du babs pa ma yin no// legs pa ma yin no/ dge ba ma yin no// de ltar lha rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur la/
262b5(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhes zlos so gal te mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang /
262b6(mdo sde): dge slong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi tso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams
262b7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso spong la nye bar
262b8(mdo sde): gnas pa dang tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa mang na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i mdun sa chos bzang du 'dus shing
263a1(mdo sde): 'khod pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / par/
263a2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / dge slong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi tso bo la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / gsod nams
263a3(mdo sde): byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag byin bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang /
263a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes smad na ni/ de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yi rangs zhing 'gu bar gyur nas/ yid
263a5(mdo sde): rangs pa nyid kyang slob par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge slong du 'dzin pa dang //
263a6(mdo sde): bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi rtse bo la rim 'gro byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na
263a7(mdo sde): mtho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par spangs
263a8(mdo sde): te/ 'dug pa dag mang ba ni mi rnams kyi chos bzang ngo // rkyen du bab po legs so dge'o// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur la/ lha ma
263b1(mdo sde): yin rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'dri ba bar 'gyur ro// zhes zlos/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i 'khor rab tu dga' la zade zhing yid bde ba skyes
263b2(mdo sde): par rig nas de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa smras pa// 'dir ni zla phyed tshes rgyad dang // de bzhin cu bzhi cwo lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la// gso sbyong yan lag rgyad pa la//
263b3(mdo sde): shin du mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'drir// nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin du gyur/ dge slong dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang 'di skad du// 'dir ni zla phyed tshes rgyas dang //
263b4(mdo sde): de bzhin cu bzhi co lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la// gso sbyong yan lag rgyad pa la// shin du mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra bar de 'drar 'gyur//
263b5(mdo sde): zhes tshig su bcad pa smras pa/ de ni nyes par smras pa yin gyi legs par smras pa ma yin no// nyes par stod pa yin gyi legs par stod pa ma yin no// nyes par rjod
263b6(mdo sde): pa yin gyi legs par rjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhe sdang dang bcas pa ti mug dang bcas te/
263b7(mdo sde): skye ba dang rga ba dang / na ba dang / mchi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su
263b8(mdo sde): ma grol lo// zhes nga la smra'o// de lta bas des gang 'di skad du 'dir ni zla phyed tshes rgyang la/ de bzhin du cu bzhi co lnga dang / cho 'phrul dang ni zla phyed la/ gso sbyong
264a1(mdo sde): yan lag rkyad pa la/ shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir/ nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur/ zhes tshig su bcad de smras pa/ nyes par smras/
264a2(mdo sde): pa yin gyi legs par smras pa ma yin no// nyes par stod pa yin gyi legs par stod pa ma yin no// nyes pa rjod par yin gyi legs par rjod pa ma yin no/ dge slong dag gang
264a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yin zhing / zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjesu thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa yang dag
264a4(mdo sde): pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba des ni gang 'di skad du// 'dir ni zla phyed tshes rgyad la// de bzhin cu bzhi cwo lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la// gso sbyong yan
264a5(mdo sde): lag rgyad pa la// shin du mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir/ da ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur zhes tshigasu cad pa 'di smras nas legs par smras pa ma yin no// legs par stod
264a6(mdo sde): pa yin te nyes par stong pa ma yin no// legs par rjod pa yin te/ nyes par rjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba//
264a7(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang bral ba/ ti mug dang bral ba ste/ skye ba dang rga ba dang / na ba dang 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba las
264a8(mdo sde): yongs su grol zhing / sdug bsngal las yongs su grol ba'o// zhes nga smra ste/ de lta bas na des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes rgyad dang / de bzhin cu bzhi
264b1(mdo sde): lnga dang // cho 'phrul dang ni zla phyed la// gso sbyong yan lag rgyad pa la// shin du mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra bar de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigasu bcad pa/
264b2(mdo sde): 'di smras na// legs par smras pa yin te// nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par stong pa yin te// nyes par stong pa ma yin no// legs par rjod pa yin te/
264b3(mdo sde): nyes par rjod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so// 'dzam bu gling gi kho ra khor yug na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lam dpag tshad cig tu gser gyi bye ma rdal te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i
264b4(mdo sde): nus pus mo nub tsam du yongs su khyab po// gang gi tshe 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'byung ba rten du 'byung ba de'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad cu gnyis kyi bar du chu skam
264b5(mdo sde): zhing med par te/ 'khor lo sbyor ba'i rgyal po gang nas gling du 'gro ba de ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lam yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon
264b6(mdo sde): byung ba'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rtag par 'dod pa/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe glang po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'di skor te/ rgyal
264b7(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor du de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do// dge slong dag bzhan yang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po ni rtag par 'dod pa/ nyi ma
264b8(mdo sde): shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rta rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa 'di nyid skor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du song nas khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do// spyi'i sdom ni/
265a1(mdo sde): ri dang skyes pa'i gnas dag dang / nam mkha' lding dang nye tshong dang / grang ba dang ni lnga par byas/ dus tshigs dang ni tha ma yin/ 'jig
265a2(mdo sde): rten bdags pa las tshig drug pa'o// sdom ni// srungs ma lha'i grong khyer srung dang rgyal byed/ chos bzangs sgyu ma'i lam dang 'obs dang skyed mo tshol/ sa gzhi
265a3(mdo sde): dang ni yongs su rdol dang glang chen rnams/ lha ma yin rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra ba yin/ lha'i grong khyer dang lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi bar du/ sum cu rtsa gsum
265a4(mdo sde): pa'i srungs ma rnams pa lnga bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / lag na yol go thog pa'i lha rnams dang / phreng ba thogs pa'i lha rnams dang /
265a5(mdo sde): rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnamaso/ gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lhan cig g.yul 'gyed
265a6(mdo sde): par 'dod par gyur pa'i tshe/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / bung bu chung gi tshogs
265a7(mdo sde): rnams go gyon to// go cha rnam 'gyon pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul la byas pa dang / bai dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so//
265a8(mdo sde): go cha rnam bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas mtshon cha rnams la 'di lta ste/ ral
265b1(mdo sde): gri dang dung dang / 'phang mdun dang / mda' bzhu rnams len to// mtshon cha rnam bzhi ral gri dang mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' bzhu rnams blangs nas sum//
265b2(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ngo // lha ma yin de dag gi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /
265b3(mdo sde): rta'i tshogs dang / shan rta'i tshogs dang / bung bu chung gi tshogs kyi go cha bgos te/ go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya
265b4(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang 'phang mdung dang / mda' bzhu rnams blangs te/
265b5(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ba de dag chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis mthong ngo / mthong nas chun
265b6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i klu rnams kyang / dpung gi tshogs gi yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / bung bu chung gi
265b7(mdo sde): tshogs kyis go cha bgos na/ go cha rnam bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam bzhi ral gri
265b8(mdo sde): dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mda' gzhu rnams blangs te/ lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der gal te klu rnams
266a1(mdo sde): rgyal te lha ma yin rnams pham par gyur na ni/ klu rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/
266a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyu ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te klu rnams pham na ni lha ma yin gyi sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma dang / klu rnams
266a3(mdo sde): thub cing pham par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po na lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams gang na 'khod
266a4(mdo sde): par dUr zhing 'gro'o// de lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang chun gnas pa'i lha rnams/ srungs ma gnyis cig tu bsdongs nas/ lha ma yin dang lhan cig tu g.yul
266a5(mdo sde): 'gyed do// der gal te srungs ma gnyis rgyal te lha ma yin rnams pha ma ni ni srungs ma gnyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas lha
266a6(mdo sde): ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// der gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te srungs ma gnyis 'pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma gnyis lha ma yin
266a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po nas bang rim gnyis pa phreng thogs kyi lha rnams gang nas
266a8(mdo sde): 'khod par rnar cing 'gro'o// de nas phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i lha rnams dang / srungs ma
266b1(mdo sde): gsum po rnams cig spongs nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// der gal te srungs ma gsum po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni
266b2(mdo sde): srungs ma gsum po dag gis/ lha ma yin rnams thub cing 'pham par byas nas/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi gro khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
266b3(mdo sde): gal te lha ma yin rgyal te srungs ma gsum po rnams pham na ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi srungs ma gsum po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi thub cing pham par byas nas/ zlog
266b4(mdo sde): cing rgyab ston par byas nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab bang gnyis pa nas bang rim gsum rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams gang nas 'khod par rdur zhing 'gro'o// de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha
266b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i lha rnams dang / srungs ma bzhi po rnams lhan sdongs
266b6(mdo sde): nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der gal te srungs ma bzhi po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ srungs ma bzhi po rnams kyis
266b7(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar byed do// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/
266b8(mdo sde): srungs ma bzhi po rnams pham na ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma bzhi po dag/ lha ma yin rnams kyi thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston/
267a1(mdo sde): / par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gsum pa na/ bang rim bzhi pa'i rgyal po bzhi pa rnams gang na 'khod par
267a2(mdo sde): rdur zhing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs kyi
267a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma lnga po rnams dus cig tu spongs nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der
267a4(mdo sde): gal te srungs ma lnga po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srung ma lnga po rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab ton par
267a5(mdo sde): byas nas lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te lha ma yin rnams rgyal te srungs ma lnga po rnams pham na ni/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi/
267a6(mdo sde): srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab sten par byas nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim bzhi pa nas/ steng gi bzhi
267a7(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gang na 'khod par nus shing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po bzhi po rnams kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas/
267a8(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// ko'u shi ka gang bdag cag srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing pham par byas te/
267b1(mdo sde): bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi bzhir nur te 'chis pa mkhyen par mdzeg cig/ ko'u shi ka da ltar gyi dus la bab par bgongs shig/
267b2(mdo sde): de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis ltar mnyan nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag gang srungs ma
267b3(mdo sde): lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing pham par byas te/ zlog cig rgyab ston par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhi nur te/
267b4(mdo sde): 'ongs par shes par gyis shig/ grogs po dag gis dus la bab pa soms shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu rten pa
267b5(mdo sde): la bsams so// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab rtan gyis/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis bsam pa rtogs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag
267b6(mdo sde): bskam pa la sbyang ba 'am/ rkyang ba las bskam pa bzhin du/ glang po tshe rab tu brtan pa 'dzam bu gling nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i
267b7(mdo sde): lha'i rnams kyi nang du song ngo // song na yang mego sum bcu rtsa gnyis sngon par sprul na/ mgo re re la mche ba drug drug mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing /
267b8(mdo sde): bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu me re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog
268a1(mdo sde): me re re la sil snyan bdun bdun/ mngon par sprul te/ mgo' di dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad par 'phags pa gang yin pa de ni lha'i
268a2(mdo sde): dbang po rgya byin zhon no// de las bzhan pa'i lha rnams ni nye dbang sum bcu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no// de las bzhan pa'i glang po che rnams la ni/ de las bzhan pa'i sum
268a3(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams zhon no// de shin du 'gyogs te/ dper na 'jigs pa'i rlung ngam/ 'chags pa'i rlung ste/ de nas lha 'am lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du 'di ni
268a4(mdo sde): bdag gi mdun du 'gro'o zhes 'am/ phyin nas 'ongs ngo snyam du sems dpa' med do// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong
268a5(mdo sde): khyer kyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas byung ste/ skyed mos tshal gtsub 'gyur tshal du phyin nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa btang nas/ 'di lta ste lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che
268a6(mdo sde): zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byor ldan par 'gyur/
268a7(mdo sde): te/ rtse zhing dga' la dgur bcod de/ rang gi 'bras bu nyam su myong ngo // ci tsam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mo tshol rtsub 'gyur du rtse zhing dga' la dgur/
268a8(mdo sde): gcod pa de tsam du lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur la sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ de dag lus rtsub pa dang / sems rtsub pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon par mos/
268b1(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag 'di lta ste/ grang po'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis goH
268b2(mdo sde): rnam bzhi 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams sgo so// gos cha rnam bzhi gser/
268b3(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas dang / shel las byas pa rnams dgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam bzhi 'di lta ste ral gri dang mdung dang /
268b4(mdo sde): 'phang mdung dang / mda' bzhu rnams blangs so// mtshon cha rnam bzhir ral gri dang / mdung dang 'phang mdung dang / mda' gzhu rnams blangs nas/ lha ma yin
268b5(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed de/ ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing 'pham par byas te/
268b6(mdo sde): bzlog cing rgyab rten par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir log lo// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha'i phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed
268b7(mdo sde): na ni der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di lta lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na yang / lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do//
268b8(mdo sde): snyam du shes nas phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// gal te len gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams 'pham na/
269a1(mdo sde): ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyi lha rnams thub cing 'jam par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab rten par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogasu lha'i grong khyer
269a2(mdo sde): gang na bar phyir log go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag
269a3(mdo sde): cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byas nas/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir log te/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig
269a4(mdo sde): tu g.yul 'gyed de/ gal te lha ma yin rnams 'ba' shig rgyal te/ lha ma yin gyis lha rnams 'jam par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab ton par byas nas/ lha'i grong
269a5(mdo sde): khyer du 'jug go/ lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis sha cher
269a6(mdo sde): gan so// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni lha'i grong khyer du 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa ldan pa'i sems kyis
269a7(mdo sde): shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gi ni mi rje'o snyam pa'i shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug/ gal te lha rnams rgyal te lha ma yin rnams pham na ni lha rnams kyis/ lha ma yin
269a8(mdo sde): rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lham
269b1(mdo sde): yin gyi phyi bzhin snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa lags na/ yang lan gnyi su/
269b2(mdo sde): g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du sems nas lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/
269b3(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams pham na ni lha rnams kyis/ lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bder phyir log go// 'on
269b4(mdo sde): kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin snyegs par byed na ni der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha rnams bdag cag gis phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/
269b5(mdo sde): yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig du g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gsum/
269b6(mdo sde): du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyi lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyal ston par byas nas/ lham
269b7(mdo sde): yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug// lha ma yin gyis grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams gcad de/ lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyi mi tshugs la/ kyang 'jigs skrag pa
269b8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyi der mi 'dzi bzhin du lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin rnams kyi grong du
270a1(mdo sde): 'dug kyang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi bdag cag ni 'dir mi brdzi bo snyam du mthong ba 'jug/
270a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na lha ma yin rnams rgyal te lha rnams pham na ni/ lha ma
270a3(mdo sde): yin rnams kyi lha rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas te/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyir ldog go/ 'on
270a4(mdo sde): kyang lha ma yin rnams phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/
270a5(mdo sde): yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas lha rnams phyir log go/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig du g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gnyis yang
270a6(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ bzlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogasu
270a7(mdo sde): lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag
270a8(mdo sde): cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do// snyam du shes nas phyir log go/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do//
270b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de lha ma yin 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni/ lho ma yin rnams kyi lha rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/
270b2(mdo sde): lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / ldan pa'i
270b3(mdo sde): sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis mi rdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang / 'di ltar lha rnams ni lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing
270b4(mdo sde): skrag pa dang ldan pa'i kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag gis ni der mi rdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ dge slong dag snga ma 'das pa'i dus nas/ lha dang
270b5(mdo sde): lha ma ya ni g.yul du zhugs pa na/ lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab
270b6(mdo sde): ston par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin rnams kyi grong khyer gang na ba der phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du skegs par byed/
270b7(mdo sde): pa ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di lta lha 'di dag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lag gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam
270b8(mdo sde): du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir log te/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// gal te lan gnyis su lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni
271a1(mdo sde): @#lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab par byas nas/ shing rta ste phyogs na lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang nas/
271a2(mdo sde): der phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi
271a3(mdo sde): bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog te/ lha rnams kyang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// gal
271a4(mdo sde): te lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyi lha ma yin rnams thub cing pham par byas te/ zlog cing rgyab ston par byas nas/ lham
271a5(mdo sde): yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go// lha ma yin gyis grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo bcad de/ lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyi mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems
271a6(mdo sde): kyis shas cher gan so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du lha rnams kyang ji ltar lha ma yin rnams ni/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /
271a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi bdag cag gis ni der mi rdzi bo snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de lta bur gyur to//
271a8(mdo sde): ji skad du gang tshe lha dang lha mni lhan cig tu/ gnyis ka 'dus shing g.yul ni 'gyed pa na/ shing rtag pa'i nyi zla mtshungs pa med/ lha'i shing rta pa'i mchog yin no// zhes
271b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba lta bu'o// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gang gi bzhin/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i grong khyer blta na sdug ces byas pa tshur dpag tshad nyis stong lnga rgya/ rgyar dpag
271b2(mdo sde): tshad nyis stong lnga n+ya/ mtha' bskor du dpag tshad khri yod pa dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa bzhi yod de/ gser gyi rabs skor te/ rab pang du dpag
271b3(mdo sde): tshad phyed dang gsum yod do/ ra ba de las cog rnam pa bzhi las byas pa yod do// gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang /
271b4(mdo sde): shel las byas pa rnams so// byen du 'phags pa'i mda' yab dang / thar du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang / sti khang rnams bzhi yod do// gser las byas pa dang /
271b5(mdo sde): dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam so// de'i nang gis gzhi dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa mdzes te/ bkra shis shin
271b6(mdo sde): du bkra ba tshog sna rgya rtsa cig gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam shing shin du 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te/ rkang pa rtag na ni
271b7(mdo sde): bar zhes byed la/ me tog man d+ha ra ba mang pos pus mo nub tsam du yongasu khyebs te/ klung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs
271b8(mdo sde): par 'grems te 'di skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams kyis dbang gis mthu stobs kyis/ lha'i grong khyer dag na klung chen dang / me tog rnying pa dag gi mdor bar
271b9(mdo sde): gang pa bgagan ni ma shes byed/
272a1(mdo sde): byed/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o// lha'i grong khyer de na sgo dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/
272a2(mdo sde): sgo re re la yang 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod do// sgo re re la yang skar ma'i gzugs su byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las
272a3(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnamaso// zla ba khams pa lta bu yongs su grub pa/ ba glang gi mgo lta bu dang / mi
272a4(mdo sde): long rnams kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam bzhi yod te/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la
272a5(mdo sde): mdzes pa yod do// sgo re re la yang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams srung ba'i srung ba'i phyir dang / skyab pa'i phyir dang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir dang / go cha bgos shing
272a6(mdo sde): mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa lnga rgya yod la/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lam srang srid du dpag tshad nyis stong rgya yod pa/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/
272a7(mdo sde): dbyibs legs pa blta na sdug pa mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal bcing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ srang de'i ngos g.yas g.yon rdzing gser las byas pa/
272a8(mdo sde): dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam bzhi rtsigs pa'i ngag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las
272b1(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam bzhis rtsigs pa'i rdzing dag yod do// rdzing de dag gi phyogs bzhin/
272b2(mdo sde): them skas bya ba yod/ rdzi de de dag gi lan kar gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dur+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams pa bzhi sa
272b3(mdo sde): kun nas skor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gany+dza nan dang / shar ba ni dngul las byaso// dngul ni gser las byas// bai dur+ya'i shel las byaso// ku mu
272b4(mdo sde): ta dang dkar pos yongs su khebs te chu na skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs
272b5(mdo sde): can rnams skad snyan pa byin te/ rdzing de dag gi nyen kor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing //
272b6(mdo sde): dbyibs legs par skyes shing / dbyings legs pa yongs su grub pa te/ me tog thogs bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas mi
272b7(mdo sde): tog gi phreng the gu la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna brgyan legs par byas bzhin te/ skam la skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang /
272b8(mdo sde): skad mnyan pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de dag gi nyen skor na dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste sngon
273a1(mdo sde): po dang dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po dag go/ gzhag gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po/
273a2(mdo sde): dag go/ dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag go/ rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang
273a3(mdo sde): rgyan dang sna rgyan dang / snyan pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag gis ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems skyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong
273a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// rol mo'i cha bya sna tshogs pi bang dang glang bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am
273a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems skyed ma thag du de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang chang gi gtung dag yod do// yang /
273a6(mdo sde): tog rnams dang / khang pa rtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / sali khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / sti khang rnams
273a7(mdo sde): bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mang pos sten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dra'i tshogs kyis legs
273a8(mdo sde): par sgo ba dang / bzla ba dang / btung ba dang / ldan pa dag yod de/ de na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' dgur spod do// rang
273b1(mdo sde): gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer kyi dbus na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed nur dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ rgyar
273b2(mdo sde): dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ mtho'i skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig yod de/ de na lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad
273b3(mdo sde): phye dang lngas byin du 'phag so/ khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed de'i rmang rten rnam pa bzhi las 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang /
273b4(mdo sde): bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams dang / khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba de'i them skas rnam pa bzhi yod pa las 'di skrod pa la 'di lta ste gser
273b5(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed kyi ka ba
273b6(mdo sde): rmugs pa la 'di lta ste/ gser la byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams te/ gser gyi rkab ni
273b7(mdo sde): ka rten dang ka zhu dang / bre phul dang / gdung rnams dngul las byaso// shel gyi ni ka rten dang ka zhu dang / bre phul dang / gdung bai dUr+ya las byaso// khang bzangs
273b8(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal byed de'i phyam rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang /
274a1(mdo sde): shel las byas pa rnamaso/ khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la them klas bzhi las byas pa dag yod do// 'di lta ste gser las byas/
274a2(mdo sde): ba dang dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnamaso// rnam pa bzhi rtsig so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la/ lan kan
274a3(mdo sde): gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas skor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi
274a4(mdo sde): rten ma dang / gnyan na dang / shar ba ni dngulas byaso// dngul gyi ni ge ser las byaso// bai dUr+ya'i ni shel las byaso// shel gyi rten ma dang gnyanan dang /
274a5(mdo sde): shar ba ni bai dUr+ya las byaso// bar sdom ni/ rmang rten them pa rkang pa dang / phya ma rten dang ni stobs ldan bya ma/ 'khor sa dang ni spang len khang / ya phub dag
274a6(mdo sde): ni tha ma yin/ khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed la/ bgam brgya yod/ ba ga ma re re la yang khang partsegs pa bdun bdun yod do/ khang brtsegs pa re re la
274a7(mdo sde): yang gnas khang bdun bdun khung re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog me re re la yang sil snyan bdun bdun yod de//
274a8(mdo sde): khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed na nang na/ rdzing du byas pa yod de rdzing bu de la tshur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ kha tshon du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu mtha' skor du yang dpag
274b1(mdo sde): chad nyis rgya yod do// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa dag yod do// them rgas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa
274b2(mdo sde): dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i pha gu rnam bzhi rtsigaso// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhir yang lan kan dag gis kun nas skor te lan kan rnam pa bzhi dag gis rnam pa bzhin
274b3(mdo sde): te/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa mdzes pa chu bsil zhing nu sbrang ci lta bus gang ste me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs pa chu
274b4(mdo sde): na skyes pa bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nyen
274b5(mdo sde): skor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang 'bras bus shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog thong
274b6(mdo sde): bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba the gu la skyes pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan leg
274b7(mdo sde): par byas pa bzhin te/ skam la skyes pa'i bya rna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams
274b8(mdo sde): skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag go/ bzhag gos rnam pa bzhi ste/
275a1(mdo sde): @sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag go/ dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi ste sngon po dang ser po dang
275a2(mdo sde): dkar po dag go// brgyan sna tshogs dang / lag brgyan dang rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dag 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byang
275a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs 'di lta ste pi bang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / kharnga dang sgra snyan pa dag 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag kyang yod do// lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis ji lta bu 'dod
275a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems skyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyuraro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang spang chang gi gtung ba dag kyang yod do// yang rtog rnams
275a5(mdo sde): dang / khang partsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo ltas rnams dang / bsti khang rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par
275a6(mdo sde): byas shing lha'i bu mo mang po ston pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par gos pa dang / bza' ba dang gtung
275a7(mdo sde): ba dang / ldan pa yod de/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' dgur spyod do rang gis las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i
275a8(mdo sde): grong khyer gyi shar lho mtshams na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mdun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad sum rgya rgyar dpag tshad sum rgya/ mtha'
275b1(mdo sde): skor du dpag tshad dgu rgya yod do// lha'i grong khyer gyi shar lho mtshams dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi 'phag so// lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs kyi bzhi dang / yang tog
275b2(mdo sde): dang dga' ba dang spyi 'dus kyi gdung dang / yang tog gi rtse bzhi dang / phya ma gzungs dang / phyam dgu po thams cad shel las byas pa/ dbyibs legs shing /
275b3(mdo sde): lta na mdzes pa ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi kun nas skor to// de la sgo dang yang
275b4(mdo sde): phug dang / yang tog gi rtse bzhi dang / lun dang / phya ma dgu po yod de/ phya ma dgu po re re la yang ka ba bcu drug bcu drug gi kun nas rten to// rgyu ba'i lam ni
275b5(mdo sde): rim pa bdun yod do// de'i dbus na bai DUr+ya la byas pa'i ka bzur rgyad pa gsal shing 'phags med la mtshan dang ldan pa bzhi ka yod// skra'i rtse mo tsam gyi khang pa
275b6(mdo sde): rtsegs pa'i spyi 'dus kyi rten la mi reg go// de'i 'og na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gser gyi khri bzang po dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams
275b7(mdo sde): pa yod do// der sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod nas/ lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi don dang / chos sems shing dpyod de/ yongs su
275b8(mdo sde): rtog par byed do// lha'i grong khyer na rgyu ba'i lam kha mtshon du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal
276a1(mdo sde): du/ cing tsan dan gyis nus chag chag btab pa yod de de ngos g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna
276a2(mdo sde): tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog thog bzhin gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng
276a3(mdo sde): rgyud kyi bslob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba the gu la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te skam la skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad
276a4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur gyur pa'i gzugs can rnams kyang skad snyan 'byin to// lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun rim gyis skor te 'obs
276a5(mdo sde): de dgas kyang zabs dang / kha mtshon du dpag tshad tsam yod de/ pha gu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / rnam pa
276a6(mdo sde): bzhi'i rtsig pa las chu gsil zhing chu sbrad tsi lA lus gang ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khyebs la chu na
276a7(mdo sde): skyes pa'i bya na tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad pad du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur rgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// 'obs de
276a8(mdo sde): dgan nu dka' dang / rgyu mu gung dang / gru sna tshogs byas pa dag yod de/ de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams nu'i rtsed mo la rtse zhing dga' dgur spyod do// 'on
276b1(mdo sde): de dag gi nyen kor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs yod rnams legs par skye zhing / dbyibs legs shing yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog
276b2(mdo sde): thong bzhin du gyur na ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba theg la rgyus dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par
276b3(mdo sde): byas pa bzhin te/ skam la smras pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur gyur pa'i gzugs can skad
276b4(mdo sde): snyan pa 'byin te/ de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse dga' la dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong
276b5(mdo sde): khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi skyed mo tshal/ shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba yod de/ tshur dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu
276b6(mdo sde): yod rgyar dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug mdzes pa gser gyi dra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i
276b7(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad cig yod par ba de la cog gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod/
276b8(mdo sde): gyen du 'phangs pa dang thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang / sti khang rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa
277a1(mdo sde): tshogs
277a2(mdo sde): dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// de'i nang ni dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa bkra shis shin du bkra ba sna tshon sna rgya rtsa cig
277a3(mdo sde): gi bkra ba ste/ 'jam pa ni dper na/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed la/ me tog man d+ha ra ba mang
277a4(mdo sde): pos pus me nub tsam du yongs su khyebs te/ rlung gis mthus me tog snying pa rnams ni dor me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ ji skad du lha rnams bsod
277a5(mdo sde): nams dbang gis rten gyis na shing rta sna tshogs can na rlung che ldan/ me tog gsar pa rnam ni legs par 'grems/ zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o// skyed mo tshol shing rta sna
277a6(mdo sde): tshogs kyi nang na/ rdzing bu dpag tshad lnga bcu/ kha tshon du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya yod do// rdzing de yang
277a7(mdo sde): gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis rtsigaso// rdzing de'i phyogs bzhi
277a8(mdo sde): na them smras byas pa yod do// them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang /
277a9(mdo sde): pha gu rnam pa bzhi rtsig so/ rdzing de'i lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya lis byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa
277b1(mdo sde): bzhis kun nas bskor te/ nu bsil ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang zhing me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po yongs su khyebs la/ nu la
277b2(mdo sde): skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs/ skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur rgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa dag 'byin to// rdzing
277b3(mdo sde): de'i nye skor na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa dag yod de/ me tog thod bzhin
277b4(mdo sde): du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog phreng rgyud de las/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba the gu la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi sna rgyan legs par byas
277b5(mdo sde): pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur gyur pa'i gzugs can rnams
277b6(mdo sde): skad snyan pa dag 'byin no// dpag bsam gyi shing dag rnam bzhi te/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag go/ bzhags gos rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon
277b7(mdo sde): po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po dag go/ dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar
277b8(mdo sde): po dag go/ rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang rgyan snang ba dang mi snang ba rnams la shing ljon pa dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste bi
278a1(mdo sde): bang dang gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / kharda dang sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams/
278a2(mdo sde): kyis ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems skyed ma thag tu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnams pa bzhi dang sbrang tsi dang / sbrang chang gi tung ba dag kyang yod do// yang /
278a3(mdo sde): rtog rnams dang / khang pa rtsegs pa dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzengs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / sti khang
278a4(mdo sde): rnams bu med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo dag gis sten pa dang / sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis
278a5(mdo sde): legs par bgos pa dang / bza' ba dang gtung ba dang ldan pa dag yod do// de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams g.yog 'khor dang bcas te rtse zhing dga'
278a6(mdo sde): la dgur spyod de/ bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // de'i lam chur dpag tshad nyi shu/ kha tshon du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa/ dbyibs legs pa
278a7(mdo sde): blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing rtsan gyi chus chag chag btab pa yod do// de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing ljon pa 'bras bu'i shing
278a8(mdo sde): ljon pa sna tshogs legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa dag yod do// me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng
278b1(mdo sde): rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog phreng ba the ga la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa dag te/ skam la skyes pa bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad
278b2(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyan pa dang / 'dod dgur gyur pa'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin te/ dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po
278b3(mdo sde): dang ser po dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang / dpag bsam gyis shing las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag go//
278b4(mdo sde): rol me'i cha byad sna tshogs pi bing dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyad gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod de/ rgyan sna tshog
278b5(mdo sde): lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snyan pa rnams byung ba'i ljon pa dag yod do// lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag gis ji lta bu mo dag gis ji lta bu 'dod
278b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems skyed ma thag tu de lta ba de dag gi lag tu 'ongs par 'gyur ro// lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon
278b7(mdo sde): ba dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs yod do// lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag bzhon pa ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems skyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i
278b8(mdo sde): bzhon pa la zhon par 'gyur te/ skyed mos tshal shing sna tshogs can du dong nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gis las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
279a1(mdo sde): phyi da pa ma mas sazhes / skas pa byed tham pa gang rnamasas/ rje rnams
279a2(mdo sde): shing ldan pa ma chogs dang / maman chags dang / mthog ga tshogs dang / 'bras bu ga tshogs dang / gos dang rgyan tshogs dang / lha'i bum tshogs yangs
279a3(mdo sde): gang gi tshe/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal shing dga' la dga' dgur spyod la/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu ni nyam su myong ba de'i tshe/ yang rnam pa sna tshogs
279a4(mdo sde): kyis shing du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ba na/ de'i phyir skyed mo tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o// skyed mos
279a5(mdo sde): tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa bzhi bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod do// tshur dpag tshad nyi rgya lnga bcu rgyar dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu mtha'
279a6(mdo sde): skor dung dpag chad stong yod pa dbyibs legs shing lhan sdug la mdzes pa/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang
279a7(mdo sde): shel las byas pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyis rten ma gzhan na dang / shar ba ni dngul las byaso// dngul gyi ni gser las byas// bai DUr+ya'i ni shel la
279a8(mdo sde): byas so// shel gyi rten ma dang / mnya' nan dang / shar gyi bai dUr+ya las byas so// de'i nang gis gzhi dbyings legs zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bkra shis
279b1(mdo sde): kun du bkrag/ tshon snga rgya rtsa cig gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ rkang pa bzhag nin
279b2(mdo sde): ne nas zhes byed/ me tog man ta ra ba mang pos pus mo nub tsam du yongs su khyebs te/ de na mi ma yin pa rnams kyi rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog
279b3(mdo sde): gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ ji skad du lha rnams las kyi dbang gi rkyen gyis na/ sa bzhi sna tshogs can nas rlung chen ldang / me tog snying pa rnams
279b4(mdo sde): ni 'dor bar byed me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ kha chen dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod la
279b5(mdo sde): dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes/ gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan dan gyis chus chag chag btab pa yod de/ de'i ngos g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing
279b6(mdo sde): ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs skyes shing / dbyibs legs shing yongs su grub pa dag yod de/ me tog thod
279b7(mdo sde): ba bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na/ me tog phreng rgyud dam/ me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba the gu la rgyus te/ me tog gi rna rgyan legs
279b8(mdo sde): par byas pa bzhin te/ skam las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur rgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams
280a1(mdo sde): skad snyan 'byin to// dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa sngon po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po rnams pa bzhi yod do// gzhag
280a2(mdo sde): gos sngon po dang / gser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar
280a3(mdo sde): po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs bi bang dang / gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung
280a4(mdo sde): ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams pa 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// de lta
280a5(mdo sde): 'am lha'i bu rnams ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems skyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de la bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste glang po che'i
280a6(mdo sde): zhon pa dang / rta'i zhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyis bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams bzhon pa ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems
280a7(mdo sde): skyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de las zhon nas sa bzhi sna tshogs can du 'dong zhing ci bder gnas par dga' bar byed do// de nas lha'i drang srong
280a8(mdo sde): rnams rang dgar tshangs par spang ba spong / de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shur skyed mos tshal tsub 'gyur 'tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ tshur
280b1(mdo sde): dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa dbyibs shIng lta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi dra bas kun nas skor te/ dra ba'i 'bang du dpag tshad/
280b2(mdo sde): cig yod de shing rta sna tshogs can na ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par bya'o// bye bra gi 'di yin te/ ci'i phyir skyed mo tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur zhes na/ smras pa skyed
280b3(mdo sde): mos tshal rtsu ba 'gyur nas rdzing bu rtsub 'gyur zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / rgyun rnams
280b4(mdo sde): rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu mo rtsub par 'gyur ba rnams yod la gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed tshul rtsub 'gyur tshal du dga' la dga' dgur
280b5(mdo sde): spyod pa de'i tshe/ yang lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur zhing / sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ g.yul la mos par 'gyur bas nas de'i phyir skyed mos tshal rtsub
280b6(mdo sde): 'gyur tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal gyis lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na sa gzhi bzang po rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba yod de tshur dpag tshad
280b7(mdo sde): nyis rgya lnga bcu rgyar yang dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ tshur dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ rgyar dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu mtha' skor
280b8(mdo sde): du dpag tshad stong yod la/ gser gyi dra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'bang du dpag tshad cig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du rgyas par
281a1(mdo sde): rjod par bya'o// bye brag ni 'di yin te/ ci'i phyir skyed mo tshol gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa skyed mos chal 'dres
281a2(mdo sde): ba'i tshal ni rdzing 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams
281a3(mdo sde): dang 'dres pa dang / lha'i bu mo rnams 'dris pa yod de/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mo tshol 'dres pa'i tshal na rtse zhing dga' la dga'
281a4(mdo sde): dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang tshol bar 'dres te/ shin du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed
281a5(mdo sde): mo tshol gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mo tshal 'dres pa'i tshal gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod do// tshur
281a6(mdo sde): dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ rgyar dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod
281a7(mdo sde): par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba yod do// tshur dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ rgyar dpag
281a8(mdo sde): tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas skor te/ ra ba'i phang du dpag tshad cig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji
281b1(mdo sde): skad bshad pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o// bye brag ni 'di yin te/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes byas pa zhe na/ smras pa skyed mos tshal dga'
281b2(mdo sde): ba'i tshal na/ rdzing bu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams dang /
281b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mo tshal du rtse zhing dga' 'gur spyod pa/ de'i tshe kun dga' zhing rab tu dga' la
281b4(mdo sde): dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas rtse dga' la dga' dgur dpyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong nas/ de'i phyir skyed mo tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i
281b5(mdo sde): tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mo tshal dga' ba'i tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ tshur dpag tshad nyi rgya lnga bcu
281b6(mdo sde): rgyar dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnam
281b7(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar 'tshams na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus rtol zhes bya ba yod de/
281b8(mdo sde): yongs 'dus sa rtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga thur du zug go// bang du dpag tshad rgya yod do// yal ga phyir byis pa ni lnga bcu yod do// yongasu sa rtol la
282a1(mdo sde): yal ga lnga yod do// yal gcig ni shar phyog su dpag tshad lnga bcur dud do// yal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogasu dpag chad
282a2(mdo sde): lnga bcur dud do// yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogasu dpag tshad lnga bcu dud do// yal ga lnga pa ni byang phyogasu dpag tshad lnga bcu dud do// yal ga steng ma ni dpag
282a3(mdo sde): tshad lnga bcur steng gi na mkha' la 'khyab par 'dug/ yongasu sa rtol gyi srid du dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// sboms su yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// mtha'
282a4(mdo sde): skor du dpag tshad rgya lnga bcu yod do// yongasu sa rtol gyi dri rdzi phyogasu ni dpag tshang rgyar dad ldang ngo // rdzing phyogs ma yin pa ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dad ldang ngo //
282a5(mdo sde): dpag tshad lnga bcur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams shing yongasu sa rtol gyi lo ma ser pa na/ de'i tshe
282a6(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongasu sa rtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/ da ni ring por mi thogs par 'dab ma lhag pas na ro nyam nas/ kun du dga' zhing
282a7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis shing yongasu sa rtol gyi mdab ma lhag
282a8(mdo sde): bas na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus rtol 'di 'dab ma lhag pa las na/ 'di ring po mi thogs par sbal mig thon par 'gyuraro//
282b1(mdo sde): snyam nas/ kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing
282b2(mdo sde): yongs 'dus sa rtol gyi sbal mig thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus rtol 'di sbal mig mthon po las na/ da ni ring po ma
282b3(mdo sde): thogs par sbal mig bye bar 'gyuraro snyam nas kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pas gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum
282b4(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i shing yongs 'dus rtol sbal mag byed par 'gyu ro snyam nas/ kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod
282b5(mdo sde): la skabs dang yod do/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs 'dus rtol gyi me tog kha 'bus na de'i tshe/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs
282b6(mdo sde): 'dus rtol 'di me tog kha 'bus las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha bye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas gang yin pa
282b7(mdo sde): de'i dus kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus rtol gyi matog kha byed ni/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis/
282b8(mdo sde): yongs 'dus rtol 'di me tog khabye ba las na/ don ring po mi thogs par me tog thams cad yang su 'dus par 'gyuraro// snyam nas kun du dga' zhing dag/
282b9(mdo sde): yod la/ res bska
283a1(mdo sde): tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing //
283a2(mdo sde): yongs 'dus rtol 'di me tog thams cad yongasu rgyas pa na/ yongs 'dus rtol gyi me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad rgyar ngad ldang ngo //
283a3(mdo sde): rdzing phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dad ldang ngo // kha dog gis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag
283a4(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus rtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga thur la zugo/ 'phang du ni dpag tshad rgya yod do// yal ga dang lo ma dang /
283a5(mdo sde): 'dab ma rnams kyis ni dpag tshad lnga bcur khyab po// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus rtol gyi lo ma ser ba na/ de'i tshe sum
283a6(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus rtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhag par 'gyu ro snyam nas/ kun du dga'
283a7(mdo sde): zhing rab du dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus rtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na//
283a8(mdo sde): de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus rtol 'dab ma lhags pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par sbal mig thon par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kun du dag
283b1(mdo sde): zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus rtol sbal mig 'thon pa na//
283b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus rtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na/ de ni ring por mi thogs par sbal mig 'bye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/
283b3(mdo sde): kun dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus rtol sbal
283b4(mdo sde): mig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ kye ma yongs 'du sa rtol 'di sbal mig byed pa las na da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar
283b5(mdo sde): 'gyu ro snyam nas kun dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams shing yongs
283b6(mdo sde): 'dus rtol me tog kha 'bus pa na/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs 'dus rtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na/ da ni ring po mi
283b7(mdo sde): thogs par me tog kha bye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas de'i tshe gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus me tog kha bye ba las nad ni ring por
283b8(mdo sde): mi thogs par me tog thams cad yongasu rgyas par 'gyu ro snyam nas/ de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ma sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i me tog
284a1(mdo sde): yang khabye ba las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog thams cad yongasu rgyas par 'gyur snyam na/ kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas
284a2(mdo sde): gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa rtol gyi me tog thams cad yongasu rgyas pa na/ yongs 'dus
284a3(mdo sde): rtol gyi me tog thams cad yongasu rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogasu ni dpag tshad lnga rgyar dad ldang ngo // rdzing phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dad ldang ngo // dpag tshad rgya
284a4(mdo sde): bcu ni 'od dang kha dog gi lam me/ lhan ne lhang nger 'dug/ shing yongs 'dus rtol thams cad yongasu rgyas pa'i 'og na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba
284a5(mdo sde): bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byor cing ldan par gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong // dge slong dag sum
284a6(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus rtol gyi mthu ni de tsam mo zhes gsungaso// bar gyi sdom ni/ dang por lo ma ser ba dang / de nas 'dab lhag sbal
284a7(mdo sde): mig thon/ sbal mig byed dang me tog 'bus/ me tog kha bye thams cad rgyas/ shing yongs 'dus rtol gyi nang na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mor nig
284a8(mdo sde): lta bu'i rdo leb yod do// tshur dpag tshad lnga bcu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis rgya/ 'phang du dpag tshad phye dang drug dang dpag tshad bye dang
284b1(mdo sde): bco rgyad kyi cha cig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa bkra shis shin tu bkra ba tshon sA rgya rtsa cig gis bkra ba ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na/
284b2(mdo sde): shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa te ga na ni par zhes byed la/ me tog man da ra ba mang pos pus ma
284b3(mdo sde): nub tsam du yongasu khyebs te/ de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin seng ge'i khri bzang po dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do//
284b4(mdo sde): de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams g.yar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang
284b5(mdo sde): gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ngo // ar me nig lta bu'i rdo leb kyi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa'i tshogs yod pa rnams
284b6(mdo sde): legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongasu grub ste/ me tog thod bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/
284b7(mdo sde): me tog 'phreng ba the gu la rgyus pa dang / me tog gi sna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ skam la skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang /
284b8(mdo sde): skad gnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can skad snyan pa dag 'byin to// de'i nyen skor na dpag bsam gi shing ljon pa dag rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po/
285a1(mdo sde): dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag go// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste pi dang dang gling du dang / pi bang rgyud gsum
285a2(mdo sde): pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi ste sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag go// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste
285a3(mdo sde): pi bang dang gling bu dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang rkang rgyan snang ba dang /
285a4(mdo sde): mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dag yod do// lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod pa'i sems skyed ma thag du de lta bu'i de dag gi lag du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
285a5(mdo sde): bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang sbrang tsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do/ yang tog rnams dang / khang pa rtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams/
285a6(mdo sde): dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / sti khang rnams dang / khyer du 'dug pa rnams dang / so so na 'dug pa rnams dang / rgyud mi rnams
285a7(mdo sde): dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mang pos rten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra gnyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs
285a8(mdo sde): kyis rnam par dgos pa dang / bza' ba dang gtung ba dang ldan te/ de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams g.yog 'khor dang bcas rtse zhing dga' dgur spyod de/ rang
285b1(mdo sde): gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong ngo // sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pas srung zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug
285b2(mdo sde): la mdzes pa yod de/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal dkar du 'dug la/ yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i mgo bo dbyibs legs shing lhan
285b3(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la che ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu'i srid dpag
285b4(mdo sde): tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad cig phang du dpag tshad phye dang gnyis mtha' skor dpag tshad bdun yod do// glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs gi bu'i
285b5(mdo sde): 'khor glang po che rgya stong yod de de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing lha na sdug la mdzes pa me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal dkar du 'dug cing yan lag
285b6(mdo sde): bdun shin du legs par gnas pa ste/ de dag gi mgo bo yang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes te/ sde zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog
285b7(mdo sde): ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod pa sha skag te/ gang gi tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe glang po che'i
285b8(mdo sde): rgyal po sa srung gi bus mgo bo sum bcu so gnyis mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad+ma
286a1(mdo sde): @#bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog/
286a2(mdo sde): me re re la sil snyan bdun bdun mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la lha'i dbang po rgya byin zhon no mgo bo lhag ma
286a3(mdo sde): rnams la ni nye dbang sum bcu so gnyis po gzhan rnams zhon no/ glang po che lhag ma rnams la ni sum bcu so gnyis pa'i lha rnams zhe na/ de shin du 'gyogs te dper
286a4(mdo sde): na 'jig pa'i rlung dam chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha 'am lha'i bu mo 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi 'dun du 'gro ba zhe 'am/ phyi nas 'ongs ngo snyam du sems pa med do//
286a5(mdo sde): de nas glang po che sa srung gi bu sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams so sor grong khyer gyi sgo nas 'don to// bton nas so sor skyed mo tshal du phyin par byas te/ rdzu 'phrul
286a6(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa de btang nas 'di lta ste lha 'am lci'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang / 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul te lha'i 'dod pa lnga
286a7(mdo sde): dag 'byor cing stan par byas te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do/ ji ltar rgya byin lha'i dbang po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
286a8(mdo sde): la dbang byed pa bzhin du de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris lha ma yin rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
286b1(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor grong khyer lta na sdug pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor grong khyer gser ldan zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang
286b2(mdo sde): po rgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyi khang bzangs kyang padam pa can zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa
286b3(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi mdun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi mdun sa nor bzangs zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum
286b4(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mo tshal bzhi 'di lta ste/ shing rta sna tshogs can dang / rtsa 'gyur tshal dang / dga' ba'i tshal ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi
286b5(mdo sde): skyed mo tshal bzhi yang 'di lta ste/ kun du dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba rnams yin to// sum bcu rtsa
286b6(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi zas bzang po bzhi 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs rtsub 'gyur dang / 'dres pa dang / dga' ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi
286b7(mdo sde): sa bzhi po yang kun tu dga' ma dang / rab tu dga' ma dang / dga' ma dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba ma rnamaso// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi/
286b8(mdo sde): shing yongs 'dus rtol ji lta ba bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi shing yang tsid tra pa Ta la zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ar me ni ga lta bu rdo/
287a1(mdo sde): leb ji lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi rdo leb zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mo/
287a2(mdo sde): tshal du spyad pa las srung gi bu ji lta bzhin/ lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du ji lta ba spyod pa yang ti sa'i gangs zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum
287a3(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa rab rtan ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi ti'i rgyal po yang brag 'gul zhes bya'o// sum bcu rtsa
287a4(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer ji ltar 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi grong khyer yang 'khor dang ldan pa de yin no// lha ma yin rnams
287a5(mdo sde): kyi lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid kyang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par rjod par bya'o// 'jig rten bdags pa las tshigs bdun pa'o//
287a6(mdo sde): sdom ni/ phyed nga drug thung cig mtha'/ thung dang gang dang 'bri ba dang / rnyog pa dang ni sdu ba dang / phyogs dang shar phyogs 'du byed pa/ zla ba drug du nyi ma lho
287a7(mdo sde): phyogasu 'gro ba na dpag tshad phye dang drug dang / byang phyogs su 'gro ba na dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bcwo rgyang ma cig gis rgya mtsho chen por
287a8(mdo sde): 'dor te/ 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi btso rgyad kyi cha cig khyab par byed do// zla ba drug du nyi ma lho phyogasu 'gro ste lho phyogs
287b1(mdo sde): su 'gyu/ 'jam du shing gi ng+gA myur du 'dur// tha drun tsu kyang phyogs 'gro/ byang rgyabs 'dza las nga ga
287b2(mdo sde): 'diro// ci'i phyir dgun mtshan mo ring la/ nyin mthung shen/ smras pa zlang drug nyis byang phyog su 'graste/ phyogasu 'gro ba na/ la la du na
287b3(mdo sde): mtha' myur du mdor bas/ de ci'i phyir na dgun mtshan mo ring la nyin mthung ngo // ci'i phyir dpyid dang dbyar gnyis nyin mo ring la mtshan mo thung zhen smras pa/
287b4(mdo sde): zla ba drug nyi ma byang phyogasu 'gro te/ byang phyogasu 'gro ba na/ 'dzam bu gling gi dbus ring zhig gis 'dor bas de'i phyir dpyid dang dbyar nyi mo ring la mtshan mo
287b5(mdo sde): thung ngo // ci'i phyir dgun drang bar 'gyur zhe na smras pa zla ba drug nyi ma lho phyogasu 'gro ste/ lho phyogasu 'gro ba na dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer 'byung
287b6(mdo sde): ba rnams rgya mtsho chen por bab pas/ gling rnam su grang bar gyur te/ de'i phyir dgun drang ngo // de'i phyir dpyid dro bar gyur ce na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug nyim
287b7(mdo sde): byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogasu 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer 'byung ba rnamasu bab pas gling rnamasu 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de'i
287b8(mdo sde): phyir na dpyid dang dbyar gnyis dro'o// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo tshas bcu drug man chad 'od 'bri zhing kha dog dang dkyil 'khor dang chu zheng
288a1(mdo sde): 'bri zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang nye bar 'gro te/ nye bar 'gro ba de rang gi dkyil 'khor las de'i grib ma slar babs te/
288a2(mdo sde): des de'i dkyil 'khor khebs shing de'i dkyil 'khor yogs par gyur te/ mi snang bas de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo tshes bcu drug phan chad 'od
288a3(mdo sde): 'bri zhing / kha dog dang dkyil 'khor dang / chu zheng 'bri zhe na/ de ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo gnam stong la thams cad kyis thams cad du mi snang
288a4(mdo sde): zhe na/ smras pa nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad kyis nye ru song ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi nye bar 'gro ba de rang gi dkyil 'khor las grib ma slar 'babs pas/ de'i dkyil
288a5(mdo sde): 'khor khebs shing des de'i dkyil 'khor yog par gyur te/ mi snang bas de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi gnam stong la thams cad du mi snang ngo //
288a6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngos tshes cig yan chad 'od skye zhing / kha dog dang dkyil 'khor dang chu zheng skye zhe na/ smras pa nyi ma dang mi nye bar
288a7(mdo sde): 'gro ste/ nyi ma mi nye bar 'gro ba de rang gi dkyil 'khor las grib ma chung ngur 'gyur te/ grib ma chung ngur gyur pas/ dkyil 'khor de'i phyogs cig
288a8(mdo sde): snang bar gyur te/ de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngos tshes cig yan chad 'od skye zhing / kha dog dang dkyil 'khor dang nu zheng skye'o// ci'i phyir
288b1(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ches co lnga la rnam pa thams cad du yong su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad kyis nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rnam thams cad
288b2(mdo sde): kyi nye bar mi 'gro bas de'i dkyil 'khor la sgrib pa gang yin pas nyi ma'i grib ma de dkyil 'khor slar log ste/ des de'i dkyil 'khor snang bar gyur pas/ de'i
288b3(mdo sde): phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi de chos bcwo lnga la rnam pa thams cad du yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus rnyog par 'gyur/
288b4(mdo sde): mtha' rnam par dang zhing / rnyog pa med zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad kyis nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi nye bar mi 'gro ba gling gyi de'i dbus
288b5(mdo sde): rnyog pa yod la/ chu'i rkyen gyis mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa med de/ gling rnams kyi gzugs rnyan gang yin pa des ni dbus rnyog pa yod la/ chu'i gzugs
